127431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +3/+3 and Ward. Draw 3 cards.
127431020.baseFlair_:
Eager to fathom the world below, I became a crustacean of kaleidoscopic colors. Presented as a gift to a lavish dragon's palace, I saw the depths of greed, debauchery, and gluttony—beyond even that of beasts.
—Transmigration of Renunciation, Part 1
127431020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals this follower's attack.
127431020.evoFlair_:
A band of scaled thieves infiltrated the palace. In the midst of this chaos where greed devoured greed, two dragonkin women stood, divvying up all between them. Gleefully, they cracked me in twain.
—Transmigration of Renunciation, Part 2

900441120.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900441120.baseFlair_:
I think the Princess could use a dragon to guard her chamber. Wouldn't you agree?
—Lilium, the Wyrmwitch
900441120.evoFlair_:
She is my dragon. And now, your new playmate.
—Lilium, the Wyrmwitch

900434050.baseEffect_: Gain an empty play point orb.
900434050.baseFlair_: I'm fighting too. I did horrible things in the past, and I have so much to atone for. I was weak and cowardly and all I could do was run. But along the way, I had people come to me and give me courage. And I owe them. That's why I'm here. I have debts to repay.

900434060.baseFlair_: Very well, I shall join the fray. Just a whim of mine—nothing more. I am the poison that seeps through the dark, the Forest Shadow. And I am the only villain this forest needs.

900444050.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+1 to an allied follower and deal 1 damage to it.
Then, if it's a Galmieux, Ardent Disdain, give it Storm and deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
900444050.baseFlair_: Ardor is a manifestation of disdain. Baptize yourself in the fires of wickedness if you would avoid her scorn. Only those forged by the blaze are worthy of disdain's strength, but remember: the struggle for supremacy is eternal, and those who falter will be crushed.

900422010.baseEffect_: During your turn, when an allied follower comes into play, give it +0/+1 and change it into an Armed follower. Then, banish this amulet.
900422010.baseFlair_:
You're right: I'm still weak. I'm probably a lot weaker than you. But I still have potential, and that's why I'm going to unleash it, here and now! Come forth, Draconic Weapon!
—Light Tenryu

101411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if Overflow is active for you.
101411010.baseFlair_: A youthful white dragon offers a prayer to the heavens. It prays that one day, no matter how many years hence, it shall become the equal of its parents.
101411010.evoFlair_: A youthful white dragon offers a prayer to the heavens. It prays that one day it shall fulfill a great purpose like its parents before it.

117411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any other allied followers are in play, deal 2 damage to 1, then draw a card and gain +2/+1.
117411020.baseFlair_: Oh, was that your dragon? Sorry, didn't mean to scare you. I hate dragons. Hate 'em. Just looking at 'em makes my blood boil. So what I'm saying is, you'd better keep it away from me if you value its life.
117411020.evoFlair_: My little sister was poisoned by dragon venom. She was knocking at death's door. That's why I'll slay 'em to make weapons and profit. Their carcasses are fair game—I'll take whatever I want from 'em.

118411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Bullet Bike into your hand. If Overflow is active for you, summon it instead.
118411020.baseFlair_:
Soo, in other words the client wants bolts that can be magically heated up? And they want them strong enough to withstand a dragon possibly stomping on them? Huh. Am... Am I really up for this?
—Reggie, Peerless Artisan's Blueprint No. 1
118411020.evoFlair_:
Ta-da! Behold my Flamebolts! They're made of an alloy I created from fire wyrm scales and dragonite! They react to magical energy by creating heat. Here, let me give you a demo for marketing purpo— Aiyeee!
—Delivery No. 1 for Reggie, Peerless Artisan

124411030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to another allied follower. If Overflow is active for you, draw a card.
124411030.baseFlair_:
"Kreee!" "What, are you hungry?"
"Grruu..." "Stop that, you're scaring me!"
"Groar!" "Eep! Ouch... Maybe I'm not cut out for this after all."
—Scene from a Dragon Ranch
124411030.evoFlair_:
"Kreee! (Stay away from my master!)"
"Grruu... (What? He's my human!)"
"Groar! (Why won't you play with us more?)"
—The Hatchlings, as Heard by Their Mother

127411010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Put a Razor-Clawed Thief without Last Words into your hand.
127411010.baseFlair_:
The world is chaff. Hard, tough to chew, and a nuisance. For those dragonkin born unprivileged, thievery was the only way to get by. And as luck would have it, she too, was dragonkin.
—Fields of Fasting: Memories of a Convict, Part 1
127411010.evoFlair_:
She's the brains, and I'm the brawn. Things are simpler that way. Then, before we knew it, more dragonkin came, enough to form our own squad. I was the boss, but she pulled the strings. We called ourselves the Dread Drakes.
—Fields of Fasting: Memories of a Convict, Part 2

900411060.baseFlair_:
The world is chaff. Hard, tough to chew, and a nuisance. For those dragonkin born unprivileged, thievery was the only way to get by. And as luck would have it, she too, was dragonkin.
—Fields of Fasting: Memories of a Convict, Part 1
900411060.evoFlair_:
She's the brains, and I'm the brawn. Things are simpler that way. Then, before we knew it, more dragonkin came, enough to form our own squad. I was the boss, but she pulled the strings. We called ourselves the Dread Drakes.
—Fields of Fasting: Memories of a Convict, Part 2

128411010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 3 defense, evolve it.
128411010.baseFlair_:
I see... Aerobics in the pool didn't help either, huh? The doctor tried "everything," so now you're gonna turn tail and quit? Hah. You know what you haven't tried? Getting out there and kicking the ball with your own two legs!
—Dranz Intl. School, Fiery Pep Talk, 1
128411010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128411010.evoFlair_: When the doctor told me I'd never breathe fire again, I thought my life was over. I mean, who's gonna draft a dragonborn who can't shoot a fireball? But... Coach Joe gave me another chance. He showed me that the real fire's in my soul!

900411040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
900411040.baseFlair_: Young drakes dream of the day they'll be able to spread their wings to roam their vast domain in the skies.
900411040.evoFlair_: Young drakes dream of the day they'll be able to spread their wings, covering the sky from the realm below.

110421020.baseEffect_: At the start of the opponent's turn, restore 2 defense to all other allied followers.
110421020.baseFlair_: I wonder what I'm cut out for... There's gotta be more out there than being a mermaid. I mean, the ocean gets old quick. It's nothing but water and fish!
110421020.evoFlair_: I wanna run across the grass and fly through the air! Ahh, I'm so booored. Maybe I'll get lucky and something interesting will fall from the skies...

110421030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, deal 1 damage to that follower and draw a card.
110421030.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. Refuse, and it's coming clean off. Then you'll see how powerless you are.
110421030.evoFlair_:
The Second Rule: Spread Impotence
Those who swing their might around won't last long. Cut them down—this is your mission.
—Teachings of the Disdainful Corps

122421010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower with X defense or less. X equals this follower's defense. Then, if X equals 4 or less, banish this follower.
122421010.baseFlair_: A shy creature that inhabits the sea. Her dress color resembles that of coral—perfect for hiding in while the sun's out.
122421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
122421010.evoFlair_: A shy creature who is working in earnest to change herself. She hopes to dance with the mermaids someday, using the coral as her starlit stage in the night.

123421030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, deal 1 damage to another follower and then this follower.
Once each turn, when this follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
123421030.baseFlair_: Raise your head, fool. To revel in your potency is to be freed from all restraint. To own your power is to know strength. Glory in the trampling of the weak. Follow the rules and bask in the ardor of victory.
123421030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
123421030.evoFlair_: The Ten Omens were returned to the world on a tablet of sapphire stone. Carved into a new column was the next Trial of Disdain—Ardor. Disciples fell upon the weak, filling the air with a cacophony of screams, smoke, and blood.

126421020.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded from your hand, summon a Mermaid Songstress.
----------
At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
126421020.baseFlair_:
"My song is a passionate storm! Laaaaaa!"
The sea is her studio; the churning waves and capsized boats are part of the show.
126421020.evoFlair_:
"Each note is a wave, lapping at the shore. Laaa!"
A mermaid's song is her pride; the sinking hearts and stranded sailors are also part of the show.

112431010.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
When you play a spell, evolve this follower.
112431010.baseFlair_: Thanks to the development of highly durable materials and technology rivaling the output of dragons, we have succeeded in creating aerial equipment. Now, rather than purely mimicking the power of dragons, we set our sights even further. —Dragonewt Scholar's Record, Part 3
112431010.evoEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Strike: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and then draw a card.
112431010.evoFlair_: If we're going to create something greater than a dragon, it will have to surpass dragons in every way, shape, and form. But who knows if such a thing is even possible. —Voice Recording of an Environmental Researcher, Part 3

114431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, put a random Dragoncraft follower (excluding Marion, Elegant Dragonewt) from your deck into your hand and give it +1/+0.
114431020.baseFlair_: Loving yourself is so important. And if you need a little help, I'm here for you! Wanna be cute? Cool? Breathtaking? I know how to make your charm shine!
114431020.evoFlair_:
"He's a kind-hearted person who taught me how to accessorize." —Safira, Synthetic Beast
"Hehe! His fashion sense isn't half bad! I'd give him a passing grade!" —Fashionista Nelcha

900431040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
When this follower comes into play, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
When this follower leaves play, put four 1-play-point Eternal Whales into your deck. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
900431040.baseFlair_: A calf once fell from the sky. With no way back, it made the sea its home. What was the ring floating above its head? The whale did not know. But then came the day it breached, and its enlightenment surfaced.
900431040.evoFlair_: The great white whale continues its migration in the clouds. Though nurtured by blue waters, the whale has returned to where it belongs. And now, from the highest seas above, it watches over its home away from home.

122431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, put a copy of a random allied follower destroyed this match that costs at least 7 play points into your hand, and give it Rush.
122431010.baseFlair_:
Dragoncraft's awesome! When Overflow kicks in, anything can happen!
—Hiro Ryugasaki
122431010.evoFlair_:
Shadowverse isn't easy—but that's what makes it fun. 'Cause the more you play, the better you get!
—Hiro Ryugasaki

126431020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 4 allied Armed followers have left play this match, gain +1/+1 and Storm.
Last Words: Put a Draconic Smash into your hand.
126431020.baseFlair_:
Shadowverse treats everyone the same. Whether you take it seriously, or keep fighting the good fight; whether you've got a secret to hide, want to change who you are, or you were guided here...
—Light Tenryu
126431020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126431020.evoFlair_:
We're all Shadowverse players! The weight behind each play rests on everyone the same. That's why we can go all-out in a match: it's an honest dialogue between the players. That's what makes Shadowverse so fun!
—Light Tenryu

100414020.baseEffect_: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
100414020.baseFlair_: The dark mages chanted their incantation, drew magic circles, and brought forth flame. The dragon responded with only a fiery sigh.

107414010.baseEffect_: Transform a Dragoncraft card in your hand into a Windblast Dragon.

A stream of energy spreads throughout the land and ascends like a raging dragon. It pierces the heavens, producing a meteor shower seen by all beings.

Give +1/+0 to an allied follower until the end of the turn.
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.

123414010.baseFlair_: What can be gained from slaying a dragon? Glory? Mayhap riches? Or perhaps power? Nay, 'tis redemption. Gone is the boy who ran from the battlefield; in his place is the man who has slain his inner demons.

715414010.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Put a Dragon's Handspur into your hand. If Overflow is active for you, put 2 into your hand instead.

125414010.baseEffect_:
Give +0/+1 to all allied Dragoncraft followers.
If Overflow is active for you, draw a card.

If Overflow is active for you, draw a card.

128414010.baseEffect_:
Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck.

Put a Maelstrom Dragon into your hand.

107424010.baseFlair_: Clear skies and brisk winds. But alas, a tempest brews on the horizon. —Dragonwatcher

If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, put a Windblast Dragon into your hand.
114424010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the elder dragon discovered her kindness in the laboratory, he saw a ferocious, primal aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those driven to survival.

116424010.baseEffect_:
Discard a card from your hand.
Draw a card. If Overflow is active for you, draw 2 instead.
116424010.baseFlair_:
Such is humanity's pathetic lust for gold that the foul creatures would part with treasures most dear for even a speck. That greed has kept me well fed.
—Fafnir

900424040.baseEffect_: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and draw 2 cards.
900424040.baseFlair_: We received the wisdom of the divine dragon. And at the same time, we lost the freedom to choose.

900424050.baseEffect_: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and draw 2 cards.
900424050.baseFlair_:
"Woo-hoo! What's our next target, Nova?"
"Fuel reserves depleted. Refuel recommended."
"You're kidding, right?!"
—Rola and Nova

119424010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+1 to an allied Dragoncraft follower.
If Overflow is active for you, give +2/+2 instead and draw a card.
119424010.baseFlair_: All ranch hands must adhere to the following rules. 1. Never approach large dragons from behind. 2. Never rub the scales on a dragon's neck the wrong way. 3. Never let your dragons see you cry when they leave home. See them off with a smile! —Dragon Ranch Employee Notice

715424010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+1 to an allied Dragoncraft follower.
If Overflow is active for you, give +2/+2 instead and draw a card.
715424010.baseFlair_:
Wow, a fire-breathing dragon! This is way too cool!
—Mio Honda

Put a random Natura follower from your deck into your hand.
If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, put 2 different Natura followers into your hand instead.
121424010.baseFlair_: It happens one day, after the heroes depart. A tiny child's creation catches the shadow's eye. The encounter forges a bond, creating a community of beastfolk and robots centered around their beloved Forest Shadow. —Tales from Naterra, Entry 8

126424010.baseEffect_:
Put a Draconic Weapon into your hand.
If there are any Armed followers in your hand, put a random Armed follower from your deck into your hand.
126424010.baseFlair_:
It seems Shadowverse is my destiny. That's why I want to approach it head-on.
—Light Tenryu

717424010.baseEffect_:
Put a Draconic Weapon into your hand.
If there are any Armed followers in your hand, put a random Armed follower from your deck into your hand.
717424010.baseFlair_:
It's too early to give up! This battle's not over yet!
Get ready! Sheathe them in your scales, Draconic Armor!
—Light Tenryu

110434010.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an allied follower. Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
110434010.baseFlair_: I'll crush it to rubble, until even the ruins are just ashes and dust!

120434010.baseEffect_:

Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader.
120434010.baseFlair_:
All dragons were born from flame. And now the time has come to return to your mother.
—Prime Dragon Keeper

123434010.baseEffect_: Give an allied follower the following effect and then deal 1 damage to it: Whenever this follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, draw a card.
123434010.baseFlair_:
"You're not bad. I guess you've got more than just a frosty attitude going for you."
—Galmieux, Ardent Disdain
"Your flames don't stand a chance. I'll turn it all into ice."
—Filene, Blizzardous Heart

900434030.baseEffect_:
Put a Windblast Dragon and a Dragon into your hand.
Enhance (10): Summon them instead.
900434030.baseFlair_:
His voice echoes into the distant clouds.
His followers' baying response descends like thunder.

900434070.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Put a Draconic Weapon into your hand.
900434070.baseFlair_:
Still... Right now, we're connected by Shadowverse! We can show each other, right here and now, what Shadowverse is for us!
—Light Tenryu

900444030.baseEffect_:
Give +0/+1 to a follower in your hand.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
(Can be played only if there is a targetable card in your hand.)
900444030.baseFlair_: What good is the sky if you can't fly in it?

900444040.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if this card is in your hand and there are 3 or less Curse of the Black Dragons in your hand, activate the following effects.
-If Overflow is not active for you, reveal this card and deal 1 damage to your leader.
-If Overflow is active for you, reveal this card and deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
900444040.baseFlair_: This curse is mine to bear; it's a symbol of my weakness. But I'll overcome it and turn it into strength—a strength that will protect everyone!

900444060.baseEffect_:

If Overflow is active for you, give all allied Si Long, Draconic God-Queens the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
900444060.baseFlair_: I am a dragon! A god-queen! No one—NO ONE!—tells me what I can or cannot do!

104412010.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader, draw a card, and destroy this amulet if Overflow is active for you.
104412010.baseFlair_: Adventurers' mouths water at the value of dragon eggs; dragon hatchlings' mouths water at the taste of adventurers.

113433010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (20)
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Subtract 10 from this amulet's Countdown and summon 2 Hellflame Dragons.
Whenever an allied follower comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Dragon Sphere.
113433010.baseFlair_: Ooh, shiny stuff! Found some more! —Goblin Mage

102442010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, transform all cards in your hand that originally cost 3 play points or less into Hellflame Dragons.

If Overflow is active for you, whenever a card that originally costs 3 play points or less is added to your hand, transform it into a Hellflame Dragon.
102442010.baseFlair_: A melody to summon dragons from the ends of the world.

100411010.baseEffect_: Gain +2/+0 if Overflow is active for you.
100411010.baseFlair_: My dragon and I act as one! Don't think you can underestimate the bond between us! No one can escape our wrath!
100411010.evoFlair_: You think he likes me because I'm nice? Ha! He eats nice guys for lunch. No, if you want to be partners with a dragon, you've got to show that you're tough enough!

101411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Overflow is active for you.
101411020.baseFlair_: Winds blow. A tempest brews. And then from the eye of the storm a mighty dragon emerges.
101411020.evoFlair_: A brutal gale cuts across the battlefield. The forces of evil are scattered towards the heavens.

101411060.baseFlair_: A desert-dwelling dragon that flaps its wings to summon sandstorms, which bring both destruction and the occasional good fortune.
101411060.evoFlair_: The sandstorms summoned by this dragon occasionally contain treasures that had been buried in the dunes—a spot of good fortune for those courageous enough to brave the storms.

101411110.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
101411110.baseFlair_: This creature's a little too cute to be called a dragon, but touch it and you'll end up with more than just a burn.
101411110.evoFlair_: This creature looks just like an ordinary lizard, but its bites turn people into piles of smoldering ash!

102411020.baseFlair_: Incited by its allies' fury, the foul serpentine dragon roars with animosity.
102411020.evoFlair_: Goaded on by the fury of its allies, the serpentine dragon loses itself in its rage.

102411040.baseEffect_: Whenever you discard cards from your hand, deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of cards discarded.
102411040.baseFlair_: I mostly just rage, but a hard day's work couldn't hurt either.
102411040.evoFlair_: I'm a punch first, think later kind of girl, which is really too bad for you!

103411050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower +1/+1 if Overflow is active for you.
103411050.baseFlair_: Dragons are my friends, every one of 'em. I'm not strong, and I don't have any powerful magic... but I always know what dragons are feeling somehow.
103411050.evoFlair_: Dragons are my friends, every one of 'em—the timid ones, the short-tempered ones, and every other. So if you try to hurt my dragons, they won't be the only ones fighting back.

103411060.baseEffect_: If this card is discarded from your hand, summon a Luxfang Kit.
103411060.baseFlair_: Call for help and I'll fly to you! Don't call for help and I'll still fly to you! To do otherwise would just be wrong.
103411060.evoFlair_: I don't know much about good and evil and all that stuff... But if there's any chance of making the world a better place, I'll fight!

105411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Dragoncraft follower from your deck into your hand.
105411010.baseFlair_: Open, portal of summoning! Answer my voice—may great wings beat here!
105411010.evoFlair_: Your body is my body. Your life is my life. Live the future together with me, winged compatriots!

106411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Fire Lizard into your hand.
106411010.baseFlair_: My dear little one, it's meal time. Make sure you eat my special lava stew slowly, okay?
106411010.evoFlair_: My dear little one, you've grown so quickly, haven't you? I'm looking forward to the day I'll be able to ride on your back.

108411040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Dragon's Nest into your hand.
108411040.baseFlair_: Many days have passed since I first laid eyes upon the whitewyrm. It rested on the land, motionless but for the heavy opening and shutting of its eyelids. Could it have been slumbering? Or was it perhaps... —A researcher's notes
108411040.evoFlair_: I saw it many cycles ago. The whitewyrm slumbered, concentrating its power. The power, that is, to produce the egg that will produce a new generation! —A researcher's notes

109411010.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has at least 5 attack, gain Bane.
109411010.baseFlair_: How big's your prey? That's the true mark of a hunter's skills, and why I don't even bother wasting time with small-fry monsters. The dragons on high are mine to hunt!
109411010.evoFlair_: I mean, where's the prestige in hunting weaklings? Only the dragons that feed in the heavens on high are fit to die by my blade!

110411030.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, draw a card.
110411030.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. One who recognizes not their own stupidity is completely powerless before one who does. Will you accept your folly or will you be trampled?
110411030.evoFlair_:
The First Rule: Declare Impotence
Anyone born in this day and age is completely powerless. Those who don't recognize this are the most foolish of all.
—Teachings of the Disdainful Corps

111411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to another random allied follower. Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
111411020.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. The powerless are parasites on this world—erase them all and let us enjoy a paradise for the strong.
111411020.evoFlair_: In the shadow of law stand the strong. For the strong must exercise their right to erase the powerless from this world—go forth and crush them as they cower before your might!

112411010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4 and summon a Fire Drake Whelp.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon a Fire Drake Whelp.
112411010.baseFlair_: This girl found and raised an orphaned baby dragon. She said she did it because she'd always intended to fight alongside a fearsome wyrm, but in reality she's just the type that could never abandon an innocent life.
112411010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112411010.evoFlair_: This girl explores the world on dragonback after raising her steed herself. If her original intention in adopting the wyrm is to be believed, then she has already met her goal. And yet she is still unable to ignore the cries of the little ones she encounters on her way.

112411030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if Overflow is active for you, deal 1 damage to all followers.
112411030.baseFlair_: The fishermen that frequent this bay, whenever they discuss their bad luck, they don't says stuff like, "Couldn't even get a bite." No siree, they says, "Oh gods why?! I caught the Big One!" —Sailor's Talk
112411030.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, if Overflow is active for you, deal 3 damage to all followers.
112411030.evoFlair_: The Big One—as they calls it—it eats everything under the waves, even poisonous and spikey stuff. This might just be hearsay, but they says if you catch it on purpose, it'll make you wish you'd never been a fisherman. —Sailor's Talk

113411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied Machina follower is in play, gain Storm.
113411010.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Mechafin Diver is always pursing greater depths, even when it comes to marine technological research. The mermaid is seeking additional swimming speed. —Logbook of a Seaside Research Facility 1
113411010.evoFlair_: Diving deep is fun enough. But the faster you swim, the more sea you see! I want to deliver some great memories to the folks on the shore. —Gadget Mermaid to Mechafin Diver

114411030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Overflow is active for you, put 2 into your hand instead.
114411030.baseFlair_:
That powerful frame, filled with savage lightning... He's so cool! And the way he crackles with electricity illuminates the whole area... which is kinda reassuring. It makes me... wanna touch him. D'ya think he'd get mad?
—A young traveler visiting Dinosaur Island
114411030.evoFlair_:
The velociraptor is endowed with incredible lightning powers. After being struck by lightning multiple times, its body adapted so that it could hold a charge. A single touch could spell electrocution. Approach with caution.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

115411010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
Enhance (6): Deal 2 damage instead. Gain +3/+3.
115411010.baseFlair_:
The power of dragons dwells within people. This world truly is mysterious. Amidst a world-shaking dance, three keen gazes smile in secret.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Second Scroll
115411010.evoFlair_:
Three nations are built upon three spots of power—Shuren, Konru, and Suiheki. A rivalry arises between the leaders who each hold their own conflicting ambitions. And so the curtain rises on the Dragonkin War!
—Legend of the Three Nations, Third Scroll

116411030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if a Natura card was discarded, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Last Words: Draw a card.
116411030.baseFlair_:
Seeing how fiercely it smashes those rocks, what a little cutie. From its big stony body, to its hammer-tail, I just love it. And look at its feetsies! Do you think it would eat me if I tried to pet it?
—Clueless Vacationer, on Her Visit to Dinosaur Island
116411030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116411030.evoFlair_:
The dinosaurs noticed that their land was beginning to change, to become encased in steel. But, to them, this was just another natural phenomenon. Just as water flows to find a true course, they, too, began to adapt.
—Jurassic Resistance, Part 1

117411010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand and deal 4 damage to an enemy follower. (Activates only when both a targetable card is in your hand and a targetable enemy follower is in play.)
Enhance (5): Gain +3/+3.
117411010.baseFlair_: She is the Five of Cups, vessel of loss. Obstructions in life are like a dam, causing some paths to wither and dry. But as sad as that may be, new channels will surely spring forth.
117411010.evoFlair_: I'm a dragon keeper and quencher of parched earth. I shed a single tear into a dried-up lake. For now, it's a mere drop in the bucket. But someday, it'll rival any sea.

117411030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Summon a Tropical Grouper.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon a Tropical Grouper.
117411030.baseFlair_:
Today I learned that the young live in waters with few predators. They're quite docile and reproduce quickly, darting about in schools for safety. Breathtaking. Like rainbows of the deep.
—A Traveler
117411030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117411030.evoFlair_:
As adults, they invade calm waters lookin' for easy pickin's. Savage is what they are, swarmin' all over like locusts of the sea. If you see those colors, you'd better not be in the water!
—Local Angler

119411030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Enhance (5): Gain +2/+2. Draw a card.
119411030.baseFlair_: I was always too weak and sickly to do anything... But now I've been reborn! With this new body, the whole ocean is my playground!
119411030.evoFlair_: It's weird, I feel like my vision's getting worse lately... Kind of blurry... And whenever I get close to land, I can smell something... something rEAllY TASty. WhAT's tHIs StUff in mY mOUth? Is... iS THiS bLooD...?

119411040.baseEffect_: Once each turn, when this follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
119411040.baseFlair_: Barriers do not exist for the residents of the seven seas. Neither do the merfolk hold prejudice against other species. They return goodwill with sincere hearts, and sometimes, that sincerity blossoms into love.
119411040.evoFlair_: Land or sea, there is no place to escape from a merfolk scorned. Should one be foolish enough to earn their ire, what awaits is swift retribution in the form of an arrow through the heart.

120411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck.
120411010.baseFlair_: There's a legend on the surface about a round jewel that can show you the future if you know just the right chant. Here we go! "Pain, pain, go away!" Huh... Why isn't it working?
120411010.evoFlair_:
"Wow, the pain in my fin totally went away... I think!"
"She might not know the future, but talking with her does perk me up!"
—Reviews from Satisfied Mermaids

122411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card.
122411010.baseFlair_: "Tuck tail and run? Nah, these flames ain't ever going out!" Her unwavering determination is a beacon of inspiration for the young drakes. "Even if these horns break, you'll never beat me where it counts—my will is indomitable!"
122411010.evoFlair_:
"I'll chomp ya to bits, no matter how tough you are!"
Her unfaltering pride is a beacon of pride for even the eldest of dragons.
"These scales are perfect for wreaking havoc!"

122411020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Evolve this follower.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
122411020.baseFlair_: Nature's wrath knows no bounds. Even the mightiest dragon is but a drake in comparison. I bequeathed my horns to her in respect, as should you.
122411020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
(Can attack the enemy leader.)
122411020.evoFlair_: Not even the fiercest dragon can temper the wilderness. A savage volcano, the wild seas... We are all but mere children in her eyes, undeserving of her soil!

123411010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever this follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, draw a card.
123411010.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. To revel in your impotence is to be freed from its restraint. To own your powerlessness is to know strength. Glory in your newfound state. Observe the rules and disdain all who stand beneath you.
123411010.evoFlair_: The Ten Omens were bestowed upon the world on a tablet of sapphire stone. Upon the trials' completion, the stone crumbled, but devoted disciples of disdain shunned all other authority and clung to their teachings.

124411020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain +2/+2.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
124411020.baseFlair_: The people had interpreted its protection as means of bartering, and offered the woman as sacrifice in exchange. However, the dragon merely wished to protect the people. She was captivated by its solemn devotion and selflessness.
124411020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
124411020.evoFlair_: It was the first time the offering didn't try to escape. Rather, the contrary. Her voice. Her warmth. Everything about her brought the dragon comfort. It would soon come to learn that this was love.

125411020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Dragonewt Fist into your hand and change its cost to 0.
125411020.baseFlair_: It is out of compassion that I do not bare my claws at you. Please, try to understand... I have no desire to trample the weak. If you value your life, you'll walk away.
125411020.evoFlair_: There are lines that must never be crossed... I gouged those trees and rocks as a warning not to enter my lands, yet here you are, eager to perish. Why could you not have chosen a more worthy opponent at which to bark and howl?

126411020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain Rush and draw a card.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, draw a card.
126411020.baseFlair_: At first, I wondered how I'd penetrate the hide of a creature with scales as hard as steel. Then I realized, if I could exploit the smallest flaw in just one scale, the dragon would crack like an egg.
126411020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126411020.evoFlair_: I took dragons down with the technique I'd developed. I'd crack apart a scale with my right hand, and finish the beast off with my left. Now they call me a hero, but the honor is as fragile as a dragon's scale—you're only as good as your last victory.

900411030.baseFlair_: A sea beast that does the bidding of larger creatures. Though its body is soft, its fangs are hard.
900411030.evoFlair_: A sea beast that lives in harmony with larger creatures. It nimbly maneuvers its soft body to swim circles around its prey.

104421030.baseFlair_: The skies are free, but they're merciless. They'll never stop trying to reject us, but they're our destination all the same.
104421030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give an allied follower Storm if Overflow is active for you.
104421030.evoFlair_: Though I have no wings to flap and can't soar through the clouds, I can read the wind. I can feel it! And so I aim for the distant skies.

107421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Transform a Dragoncraft card in your hand into a Blazing Breath.
107421010.baseFlair_: Can't say I'm really into the barbaric type. Don't even try to come at me—I'm one with the dragonewts, didn't you know?
107421010.evoFlair_: Not a huge fan of getting my hands dirty to be quite honest—if you could just behave yourself, you'll save both of us a lot of trouble, okay?

108421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Transform a Dragoncraft card in your hand into a Dragon's Handspur.
108421010.baseFlair_: It's ironic. The more I hate dragons and hunt them, the more my blade looks like a dragon's talon.
108421010.evoFlair_: To hunt dragons, you need incredible force. So unconsciously I've come to imitate the beasts. It's fine though. I'll wipe them all out of existence.

109421020.baseEffect_: If you have at least 7 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Whitescale Dragon or Blackscale Dragon.
109421020.baseFlair_: Upon awakening from an eternal dream, how does a young dragon see? With eyes of purity and affection, or eyes pained with malice?
109421020.evoFlair_: Upon breaking out of its shell, what does a young dragon learn? Is it the purity of love, or the corruption of hatred?

112421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied Machina follower is in play, gain +1/+0 and Rush.
112421010.baseFlair_: This li'l guy is a fiery one! He'll protect his friends, even if those friends are made of metal!
112421010.evoFlair_: This li'l guy is a cool one! If you hurt his friends, you'll incur his flaming wrath!

114421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a Giselle, Mermaid Healer or Gadget Mermaid into your hand.
114421010.baseFlair_: Hear the mermaids sing: nautical slang to be shipwrecked
114421010.evoFlair_: Marry a mermaid: nautical slang to drown

115421030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain Storm.
115421030.baseFlair_: Think you can keep up? If not, I'll leave you behind. This is my turf here on the ice. If you can't match my speed, you can drop dead for all I care.
115421030.evoFlair_: Whoa, why are your teeth chattering so hard? Is it your first time on the ice? In that case, I guess it's time to say goodbye. I'll settle this with one cool move.

117421020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a copy of a random card discarded from your hand this turn into your hand.
117421020.baseFlair_: Nothin's gonna stop me from baggin' a sea dragon today! Plus these huge hooks'll make trollin' for fish a breeze! Now that's what I call a two for one!
117421020.evoFlair_: Sea dragons are the kings of the ocean! They're huge, and they got fangs, and tails, and wings, and—whoaaa! I think I just saw one jump outta the water!

118421020.baseEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, summon a Bullet Bike. If Overflow is active for you, summon a Hellflame Dragon instead.
118421020.baseFlair_:
Tools sharper and tougher than a dragon's claw? I see the utility in making them lightweight, but will they even work if they're that light? Hrngh? Who said anything about not being able to pull it off?!
—Reggie, Peerless Artisan's Blueprint No. 2
118421020.evoFlair_:
The blade's crafted from cloven azurewings and ornamented with cloud dragon motifs—my finest work yet. I call these tools Dragon Claws. Well, my work here is done. Still... What're you hoping to make with them?
—Delivery No. 2 for Reggie, Peerless Artisan

120421020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 3 defense, summon a Hippocampus.
120421020.baseFlair_:
Many creatures make their home in the coral oasis atop this shark's back. Worshipped by fishermen, it's said that just glimpsing the shark guarantees an abundant catch. But among merfolk, it is feared as a mirage.
—Ocean Adventurer's Log
120421020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120421020.evoFlair_:
The ocean is as abundant with water as the desert is with sand. As land dwellers are guided by landmarks, so too are merfolk by coral reefs. Due to the mobile nature of the coral oasis, many a merfolk flounder and become lost.
—Ocean Adventurer's Log

121421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
121421010.baseFlair_: See that big tree over there, my steelclad friends? That's the patrol route perimeter. We've gotta have a plan, even if we're not expecting any battles. Heh, at least, that's what a friend told me once.
121421010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon 1. Otherwise, put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
121421010.evoFlair_:
"Hah! Hyah! Take that!"
"Hehe, are you still practising with that spear?"
"Yeah! I want to show Rowen what I can do the next time he comes 'round!"
—Former Mánagarmr Scouts

123421010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 3 defense, gain Storm.
Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
123421010.baseFlair_: Whoooosh! It's me, your friendly neighborhood whirlwind! Lucky you, you've got the strength of one ferocious dragon at your back! Whooosh! Is it just me, or is the wind today wild?
123421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
123421010.evoFlair_:
Haha, what a rascal. She's a small breeze now, but she'll become the wind beneath all our wings. I truly think she has the potential—I'm not just saying that because she's my cousin.
—Romelia, Lightning Striker

123421020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all other followers.
Enhance (5): Deal 4 damage instead.
123421020.baseFlair_: There once was a dragon that fought with mankind to defeat the servants of darkness. Having used much of its strength in the final battle, the regal dragon lost its form. But it paid its smaller stature no heed, and nestled itself by its fallen human companion’s side.
123421020.evoFlair_: One day, a remarkably familiar-looking human approached the dragon. It instantly understood that this was its friend, reborn. Entrusting its companion's sword to the human, the dragon set off with its old friend on a new adventure.

124421010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain +1/+1.
Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
124421010.baseFlair_:
We ain't lookin' for help—especially from humans. If you ain't got scales, get out! You'll burn your skin right off if you hang around here for too long. You wanted to thank the springs somehow? Hah! You and me both, buddy!
—Dragonjet Falls, Part Three
124421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
124421010.evoFlair_:
Someone get some charcoal here, ASAP! The scales are goin' green! Damn... Listen here, new guy. You used to be a gardener, right? We've actually got the perfect job for ya.
—Dragonjet Falls, Part Four

124421020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. If this follower has at least 4 defense, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
124421020.baseFlair_: Fruitilicious flavor, fresh from the surface! Here, try one out for yourself—feel that? Invigorating, restorative, and totally deeelish! We always get a fresh delivery when they sail by. Here, I'll show you!
124421020.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Evolve: Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. Draw a card.
124421020.evoFlair_:
Sailors call it the gate to hell—a dwelling of mermaids that drill holes into the bottoms of ships. They say the only means of passing with your life intact is to offer a barrel of fruit to the sea.
—Rumors of the Mermaid Strait

717421010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. If this follower has at least 4 defense, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
717421010.baseFlair_: The cafeteri—I mean, the school is out of this world! I'm so glad I enrolled.
717421010.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Evolve: Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. Draw a card.

(This card will be treated as a Tropical Mermaid.)
717421010.evoFlair_: I want to run a lot, so I have to win a lot! I'll work my way up the ranks, and someday... someday, I'll be the best Umamusume in Japan!

125421030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain +1/+1 and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0. If you have 10 play point orbs, gain +3/+3 instead of +1/+1, then gain Ward.
125421030.baseFlair_: Please wait, Lord Masamune! You can't enter the battlefield without your armor! What? You sense the presence of a powerful foe? Even so, you mustn't go alone! W-wait! Get a move on, troops, before he gets too far away!
125421030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125421030.evoFlair_: When my lord gets serious, even the most insidious poisons and traps roll off his back like water on a tortoise's shell. Only those willing to die by the sword stand a chance at stopping him. Forward, troops! Come what may, we will protect the One-Eyed Dragon!

127421020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, evolve this follower.
127421020.baseFlair_: This is the story of how we managed to become full-fledged dragoons.
127421020.evoFlair_:
After the accident, they told me we'd never fly again.
I dragged myself around to every doctor I could find.
Covered in dirt, we crawled on, always reaching for the sky.
And then, one day, we—

127421030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Draconic Weapon into your hand. If at least 4 allied Armed followers have left play this match, deal 3 damage to an enemy follower and then the enemy leader.
127421030.baseFlair_:
Just watch me, everyone. I'll get even stronger from this battle!
—Light Tenryu
127421030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127421030.evoFlair_:
Ms. Andrea! I've gotten so much stronger since I first came here!
—Light Tenryu

128421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. Put a random Academic follower (excluding Megalorca Rider) from your deck into your hand.
128421010.baseFlair_:
Don't give me that! We both know damn well that your passion for surfing burns as hot as ever. I'm not letting a bright young woman like you give up on her dreams! C'mon, I'll walk you through Dranz's support programs.
—Dranz Intl. School, Fiery Pep Talk, 2
128421010.evoFlair_: Fun as megalorca surfing is, it's not cheap. Between me, her, tuition, tourney fees, vet bills... I just couldn't make ends meet, y'know? But Coach Joe helped me through every step of the scholarship app. Me n' Meggie are bringing him that trophy, no matter what!

101431010.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Strike: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and then draw a card.
101431010.baseFlair_: Fighting's so brutal, is it not? I'm rather bad at it myself. I'm far more adept at weaving a little magic.
101431010.evoFlair_: I do find magic to be terribly calming. I really do wish I could simply sit weaving spells all day long. All this fighting's gone on long enough now. It really has.

101431040.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, transform this follower into a Windblast Dragon if Overflow is active for you.
101431040.baseFlair_: You'd do well to flee while I am still me. Fail to heed my advice, and you will surely regret it.
101431040.evoFlair_: Once my spell has been cast, there can be no turning back. My fangs shall sink into your heart. Well, you have been warned. There will be no mercy now!

103431030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3, Rush, and Bane.
103431030.baseFlair_: I have come from a foreign land to seize my chance to conquer the world. I do not intend to waste it!
103431030.evoFlair_: Be it knight or samurai, none can stand against my blade! Only the child of the tiger can reign supreme. Now... on your guard!

107431010.baseFlair_: My swordplay still has room for improvement, but I'm getting better little by little! One day, I'll be worthy of you, Mister Dragon.
107431010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain an empty play point orb.
107431010.evoFlair_: I need to train even harder! Just wait for me—one of these days we'll take on the world together!

115431020.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Give all enemy followers the following effect - At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and 2 damage to this follower.
115431020.baseFlair_: Sniffle... Kaya... Boss... Where'd you go? Eek! M-m-monsters!
115431020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115431020.evoFlair_: D-desperate times call for desperate measures! I'll burn you all to a crisp! Prepare yourselves... please?

116431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you discarded any cards from your hand this turn, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
116431020.baseFlair_:
Seeing how fiercely it headbutts the crags, I just can't get enough! From the jewels on its shoulders, to the gem on its head—bet it's worth a fortune. Need to get my hands on one of them...
—Intrepid Crook, on His Visit to Dinosaur Island
116431020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader.
116431020.evoFlair_:
To change is to survive. It was a harsh environment, but they learned to adapt long ago—pride would not let them surrender. Just as running water cannot truly be caught, they had rejected stagnation.
—Jurassic Resistance, Part 3

118431010.baseEffect_: Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
118431010.baseFlair_: Blessed with purifying powers and unparalleled beauty... I am a gift to you all. You may sing songs of praise in my name... Eek?! Wh-why are you staring at me so boorishly?! Wh-wh-what is wrong with people these days?!
118431010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon a Phoenix Roost.
Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
118431010.evoFlair_:
Your tears will make a delightful soup stock! You may donate them in the name of my new recipe! —Khaiza, Radical Gourmand
Your feathers will make stunning accessories! You may give them up in fashion's name! —Fashionista Nelcha

716431010.baseEffect_: Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
716431010.baseFlair_: Blessed with purifying powers and unparalleled beauty... I am a gift to you all. You may sing songs of praise in my name... Eek?! Wh-why are you staring at me so boorishly?! Wh-wh-what is wrong with people these days?!
716431010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon a Phoenix Roost.
Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
716431010.evoFlair_:
Your tears will make a delightful soup stock! You may donate them in the name of my new recipe! —Khaiza, Radical Gourmand
Your feathers will make stunning accessories! You may give them up in fashion's name! —Fashionista Nelcha

126431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Draconic Weapon into your hand. If at least 4 allied Armed followers have left play this match, recover 1 evolution point.
126431010.baseFlair_:
Hmph! Took ya long enough to install the drive, Light!
—Draconir, Knuckle Dragon
126431010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower. Put a Draconic Weapon into your hand.
126431010.evoFlair_:
Hey, don't beat yourself up about it! We're partners, and we'll always have each other's backs!
—Draconir, Knuckle Dragon

128431020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 3 defense, gain an empty play point orb.
128431020.baseFlair_:
Mother and Father always said to spread love and kindness. I've been giving compliments and flowers to everyone I meet at Dranz, but... I didn't expect quite so many people to reciprocate!
—Dranz Exchange Experience
128431020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128431020.evoFlair_:
“Dranz loves him! He already got sweet-talked into joining five teams.”
“Grrar! (Dear! He needs to learn when to say no.)”
“Now, now. He has plenty of love to give. Just like us!”
—Ian & Adelle, Exchange Program Afterparty

900431010.baseFlair_: The servants of the ocean king possess his power in their spears, free to manipulate the ocean as they please.
900431010.evoFlair_: For their beloved king, one day they shall become his very spears to bring down the birds of the sky.

108441030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Whitefrost Whisper into your hand.
108441030.baseFlair_: Anything too warm will betray you someday. It's bound to go cold in the end. That's why you don't need it, why there's no use for it. That's why you should freeze from head to toe.
108441030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
108441030.evoFlair_: Anything too warm will break in the end. It's sure to vanish. That's why you should sleep this instant. Because once you're cold, you'll be eternal.

706441010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Whitefrost Whisper into your hand.
706441010.baseFlair_: Anything too warm will betray you someday. It's bound to go cold in the end. That's why you don't need it, why there's no use for it. That's why you should freeze from head to toe.
706441010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
706441010.evoFlair_: Anything too warm will break in the end. It's sure to vanish. That's why you should sleep this instant. Because once you're cold, you'll be eternal.

110441030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If you have 10 play point orbs, give all allied Dragoncraft followers Rush. Reduce damage to those followers to 0 until the end of the turn.
110441030.baseFlair_: You have harmed my citizens and incurred my wrath. You should know better than to rouse a sleeping dragon! Hear my roar, fools, and tremble!
110441030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)

118411010.evoFlair_: Hello there, abominable seafarers! Follow me and I'll guide you to the darkest depths of the ocean. I'm sure the abysmal sights will make you regret your wicked ways!

120411020.evoFlair_: You know how soil after the rain is pliant, but after it dries it's rock hard? Well, you lowly worms that took advantage of my kindness are gonna find out what a fistful of hard-packed earth to the face feels like!

121411010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.

121411020.evoFlair_: Did they just say I'm as hardheaded as a clam? How rude! I'm as deep and refined as the sea! But then why can't I stop thinking about them...?

900411050.baseFlair_: Hissss! (Hey there, pal... You enjoying that life?)
900411050.evoFlair_: Basilisks are known to be noisy and fussy, but be warned—those who are drawn to the noise will find themselves destined for a fate of stone.

101421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower if Overflow is active for you.
101421010.baseFlair_: Wretched humans! You have destroyed the habitat of my people! Prepare to incur a wrath greater than any dragon could muster!
101421010.evoFlair_: Ha-ha-ha! Pathetic weaklings! How did you ever think you could do battle with us? The time to avenge my brethren is here at last!

101421030.baseFlair_: Walfrid must be getting desperate if he's turning to me. But I'd better let you know that I don't share my sky with the unworthy.
101421030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain an empty play point orb.
101421030.evoFlair_: Why does Walfrid keep forcing these small fry on me? Humph! It really winds me up. In fact, I think I'll go blast some fools out of the sky to make myself feel better.

101421080.baseFlair_: Sealed away inside a cave, the dragon used a faint light to plead for help. But its pleas could not reach its friends in the sky.
101421080.evoFlair_: Deep inside a gloomy cave, an eternity of solitude awaited. The dragon's once-mighty heart was eroded by endless days of silence and stillness. Eventually, after countless millennia, it lost all sense of itself.

101421090.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the attack of the strongest allied follower in play.
101421090.baseFlair_: Humph, it seems our allies are doing rather well. But I am not to be outdone! Come! To battle!
101421090.evoFlair_: Dragon and human, united as one! We are the ultimate war machine! We shall tear through enemy ranks with sword and claw alike!

103421020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+2 and Storm.
Can't be attacked.
103421020.baseFlair_: Snacks, check! Harness, check! Wyvern's mood... excellent! Just perfect!
103421020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103421020.evoFlair_: We'll surpass the legendary Dark Dragoon and mighty Phoenix Rider! Well, maybe...

105421020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Gain +4/+0 until the end of the turn if Overflow is active for you.
105421020.baseFlair_: A dragon's always in motion, slithering and writhing on. The dragon is a state of mind, the state of mind I strive for.
105421020.evoFlair_: To slay a dragon, one must shimmer like its scales. For the older the dragon, the stronger it becomes. One with the heart of the warrior understands.

106421020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Destroy an enemy follower with at least 5 defense.
106421020.baseFlair_: Armor of a dragon's curse, sword of a dragon's madness. Clad in both, the man whispers to himself. To overcome the madness he requires more madness. —Accursed Hero, Chapter 2
106421020.evoFlair_: Even a dragon will fall to frenzied swordsmanship. He yells through the bloody and violent wind. His madness is his very power; his madness is his very way of life. —Accursed Hero, Chapter 5

109421010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain Clash - Gain +1/+1.
109421010.baseFlair_: All right! Next up, I'll race you to that hill over there! Stan, you lazy butt, stand up! Training never ends!
109421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
109421010.evoFlair_: Stan and me? Hah! Don't make me laugh! Of course there's nothing between us. Stan is just my, uh... This is stupid! I'm going for a run!

111421030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Glacial Dragon into your hand.
Subtract 1 from damage taken by this follower.
111421030.baseFlair_:
Retainer: It certainly is warm today, Your Majesty.
Princess: A touch too warm. Why don't we call my pet?
Retainer: That wild dragon?
Princess: She's a sweetheart!
111421030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111421030.evoFlair_:
Retainer: Please don't stray too far, Your Majesty.
Princess: As long as you're here, I'll be fine!
Retainer: I won't be around forever...
Princess: That's what you said last millennium!

113421020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Assembly Droid into your hand.

113421020.evoFlair_: Why do you imitate the dragons' flames? They're strong enough weapons, but it's important to find claws of your own. Sharpen 'em enough and you're sure to leave a mark on the enemy. —Steelclaw Wyrm Bruiser to Wyrmcannon Dragonewt

114421020.baseEffect_:

114421020.baseFlair_:
The sight of that beast wielding those gale-force winds is overwhelming. It can ascend from the ground to the sky above in an instant. That strength is incredible to behold. Makes you wanna get a closer look.
—Rookie soldier visiting Dinosaur Island
114421020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114421020.evoFlair_:
A pteranodon is like a living whirlwind. Even on a still day, it can create the gusts it needs to soar into the skies. Approach it unprepared, and you will be blown away, along with the very earth beneath your feet.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

115421020.baseEffect_:
Clash: Gain +0/+1.
Once each turn, when another allied follower is destroyed, put a copy of that follower into your hand.
115421020.baseFlair_:
They seek territory and dominion over the land. Together, they are a collection of talented individuals brought together by fate. Bitter enemies have become one. Their name is Suiheki, the nation of unification.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Sixth Scroll
115421020.evoFlair_:
The three nations are irreconcilable, each considering the others to be mortal enemies. They see no option but to battle for supremacy. Who will take action to resolve this complicated problem?
—Legend of the Three Nations, Seventh Scroll

117421010.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded from your hand, summon an Ivory Dragon. Then, if Overflow is active for you, draw a card.

117421010.baseFlair_: Bathe in The Sun, illuminator of achievement. The Sun's path will never stray. Its invigorating rays will brighten your day. May its light chase off shadows and breathe new life into idle creatures.
117421010.evoFlair_: It summons nature's bounty, so that the living may grow. The grinning dragon flicks its tail, and the fortuitous sun rises high. And so the dragon showers warmth and joy upon those below.

125421010.baseEffect_:

Whenever an allied Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 1 play point or less comes into play, draw a card.
125421010.baseFlair_: I wasn't expecting another dragon to come into our lives. But... hehe... that just means we can have twice the fun together. When you're both grown up, we'll soar... Hey! No fighting, you two!
125421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125421010.evoFlair_: You're both growing into such fine dragons. With the two of you by my side, I've got nothing to fear, and I'll never be lonely. One day, we'll all soar through the skies together!

126421010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Draconic Weapon into your hand. If at least 4 allied Armed followers have left play this match, gain +3/+3 and deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
126421010.baseFlair_:
Shadowverse can be painful sometimes, especially when you've invested so much of yourself in it...
—Light Tenryu
126421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126421010.evoFlair_:
Even then... Shadowverse allows me to follow my heart and be myself. That's one of the great things about it.
—Light Tenryu

127421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you played a Condemned card during your previous turn, gain Rush and an empty play point orb.
127421010.baseFlair_:
She has her flaws... Too weak, can't even move her tail. That's why she does the thinking, and I act. She seems to enjoy that. If I can be together with her... then living might not be all that bad.
—Fields of Fasting: Memories of a Convict, Part 3
127421010.evoFlair_:
No matter how strong you are, a single tactical mistake could mean death. Maybe I have my flaws too. Whatever. She'll tell me what to do, and I'll follow her orders—we complete each other like that. No one can beat us.
—Fields of Fasting: Memories of a Convict, Part 4

105431010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon an enemy Dragon.
105431010.baseFlair_: Why must you bare fangs against us, O dragon? —Dragonslayer Tales, Chapter 3, Hero's lines
105431010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Banish an enemy Dragon.
105431010.evoFlair_: So be it! This royal blade and shield shall sound your death knell! —Dragonslayer Tales, Chapter 10, Hero's lines

105431020.baseFlair_: Look upon that star shimmering like a dragon's scales. It is a great revelation which foretells the fate of this land. —Merlin's Prophecy
105431020.evoEffect_:
(Can attack.)
Destroy this follower at the end of your turn.
105431020.evoFlair_: Transcend death to triumph. The star of the fire-breathing dragon will light the way to your future. —Merlin's Prophecy

106431020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - The next time you play a spell, put a Star Phoenix into your hand.
106431020.baseFlair_: Undying phoenix, weave through the stars and soar into hollow space. Clad in your gleaming flames, you are the guardian of the stars. —Records of Starforged Beings, Chapter 2
106431020.evoFlair_: Blazing hotter than the sun, flying faster than a shooting star, and bursting with limitless heat, only you have born witness to the depths of the stars. —Records of Starforged Beings, Chapter 6

108431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Dragonlife Blade or Dragonstrife Blade into your hand.
108431010.baseFlair_: I'm a wandering swordsman here to rescue people. Please don't take this personally, but I have to cut you down.
108431010.evoFlair_: Everyone has their own ideas about what's right. I follow my own. That means rescuing people, lending a helping hand— doing the stuff that gives life meaning.

111431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
111431020.baseFlair_: Ha ha ha... How fortunate you are to have this chance to witness my power! Come! I have a few things to show you!
111431020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain an empty play point orb.
111431020.evoFlair_: Ha! What do you say to that? I'm as strong as ever, because duty knows no rest! Now show me what you can do. If you impress me, there may be something in it for you!

113431010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand and then draw a card.
Can't be attacked.
113431010.baseFlair_: Fighting when you're sure to win is just... barbaric and pointless. Weaving some spells would be much more worthwhile. Battles are dirty, but... the light of magic is beautiful.
113431010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Discard a card from your hand and then draw a card.
Can't be attacked.
113431010.evoFlair_: If you leave me alone, then that'll be that. If you help me out, I'll teach you a spell or two. And if you get in the way, then your body will learn the true meaning of fear.

116431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Assembly Droid into your hand and change its cost to 0. If Overflow is active for you, put 3 into your hand instead.
116431010.baseFlair_:
Thanks to previous developments, technology has begun taking smaller and smaller forms. Current piece can use air to produce localized explosions—like wielding a storm. Guess we dragonfolk have surpassed dragons, eh?
—Engineer's Notes, Part 3
116431010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve an unevolved allied Machina follower. (Evolve effects will not activate.)
116431010.evoFlair_:
Improvement is for advancement's sake. The past falls to the present, and the present gives way to the future. Progress burns like a furious blaze and our ambition along with it. We will make the dragons ours.
—Tyranny Reins, Part 3

117431010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Banish all cards in your deck that originally cost 1, 3, 5, 7, or 9 play points.
Can only attack if Overflow is active for you.
117431010.baseFlair_: I am The Tower, envoy of collapse. Yes... Walk toward your destruction. Let lightning split you in twain. The only way to be rid of disgrace is to be buried under the rubble of terror.
117431010.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Deal 4 damage to all followers.
Can only attack if Overflow is active for you.
117431010.evoFlair_: They call me a destroyer, thus I stretch my wings and gloat. Bolts of red course through my veins to discharge tragedy as I deem fit. For you see, dragonewts derive great pleasure from toying with their prey.

118431020.baseFlair_:
Fastenings and guards made from orpiment steel? The steel ore is made in a dragon's belly and can withstand heat and pressure. Most craftsfolk'll tell you it's impossible to work the metal—lucky for you, I'm not most craftsmen.
—Reggie, Peerless Artisan's Blueprint No. 3
118431020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
118431020.evoFlair_:
It's been a good while since I've used my wrench for work like this. It truly was an honor. These Dragonscale Guards are pretty but tough. If you ever come this way again, let me know what you used them for.
—Delivery No. 3 for Reggie, Peerless Artisan

121431010.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Naterran Great Trees
----------
Fanfare: If this card is fused with at least 1 card, gain an empty play point orb.
Fanfare: If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
121431010.baseFlair_: "I always thought flowers were just ornaments." She places a hand on her sister's gravestone, looking down at the valley below. "But they're a symbol of our will; seeing them bloom is satisfying." She watches her newfound family climb the hill, hopeful for the future.
121431010.evoFlair_:
"Thank you for protecting the flowers she loved."
Petals dance in the air, fluttering against her cheeks.
"I hope your journey has as happy an end as ours."
The woman prays for the dragon knight who saved her world.

124431020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
124431020.baseFlair_:
"Hey, your skull would make a great hammer!"
The young man's prey shuddered at the sight of his weapon—the skull of a great dragon.
"I still haven't found a skull better than this. Think yours will be the one?"
124431020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Discard a card from your hand. Draw 2 cards.
Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
124431020.evoFlair_:
"One head versus another. Harder head wins. Easy enough, right?"
The young man's weapon came down with great force, shattering its prey's skull.
"Lame. You barely even put up a fight with those bones."

125431020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, recover 1 evolution point.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
125431020.baseFlair_: Ugh, the air's so thick with ash. I don't know what's worse: dealing with the ash or you pathetic weaklings. Well, considering you're about to go up in smoke anyway, I guess it's all the same. That's what you get for trespassing into my sky.
125431020.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
125431020.evoFlair_: Ugh, more small fry? Where's the challenge in that? Making me deal with these weaklings again and again... Congratulations, you've angered me. Prepare to get blasted out of the sky!

126431030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Discard 2 cards from your hand. Gain an empty play point orb. If at least 2 other allied effects have discarded cards from your hand this match, draw 3 cards.
126431030.baseFlair_: I'm a half-formed dragon because I've only got one wing? I beg to differ. I watched my siblings growing up—they live each day with pride, always supporting each other. Looking up to and learning from them is a privilege only I, as the youngest, can take advantage of.
126431030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126431030.evoFlair_:
You got Father to reinforce your shield again? He's putty in your hands, isn't he?
—Lumiore, Prestigious Gold
Guess she can get away with it, being the youngest.
—Blanc, White-Winged Brother

128431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. If this follower has at least 5 defense, summon a Hellflame Dragon. If this follower has at least 7 defense, give the summoned follower Storm and evolve this follower.
128431010.baseFlair_:
You can't play doubles alone! You have to open up to your dragon, or he'll never open up to you. I know how much you loved his mother so... give him a chance. It takes two wings to fly.
—Dranz Intl. School, Fiery Pep Talk, 3
128431010.evoFlair_: We made it back to Windeldon... After losing his mother, I—it just wasn't the same playing with him. But now I realize I was the one holding us back. Coach Joe was right. It takes two wings to fly!

106441010.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked if Overflow is active for you.
Whenever another allied Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 3 play points or less comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader if Overflow is active for you.
106441010.baseFlair_: The cowardly light the path; the wicked obstruct the future. The flames are like an omnipotent god. Those who wield them and dance among them surpass divinity. —Primal Flames, Chapter 1
106441010.evoFlair_: During the age of the gods, she burned away the darkness to bring everything into existence. Her flames gave way to our creation. She is our mother and our source. —Primal Flames, Chapter 1

Ambush.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, lose 1 play point orb. Then gain +1/+1 and Storm.

115441030.evoFlair_: Those confined by the dragon's mist are unable to see anything but the dragon. Reality fades far into the distance. You are within the dragon's prison.

Ward.

117441020.baseFlair_:
There once was a dragon keeper who worked to advance mankind. He used his affinity with dragons to bring peace. For the people, he vowed to calm the dragons endangering society.
—Summoner's Revolt, First Telling
117441020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117441020.evoFlair_:
Mankind must fall. The keeper uses his affinity with dragons to incite bloodshed. For the future of dragons, he will exterminate the humans endangering society.
—Summoner's Revolt, Sixth Telling

117441030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers. Put a Whitefrost Whisper into your hand.
117441030.baseFlair_:
Whitefrost will eventually blanket even the fiercest fighting spirit. Her blade freezes fire, leaving only flowers of whitefrost to bloom in the still darkness.
"All I can rely on is myself."
117441030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Whitefrost Whisper into your hand and change its cost to 1.
117441030.evoFlair_:
All she can hear in the quiet darkness is the crunch of permafrost under her feet. The screams are gone. Only those ardent memories remain inside her.
"Don't try to thaw my heart."

118441020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain Storm.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, gain an empty play point orb.
118441020.baseFlair_: The Flamebolts in the rotating mechanisms make radiating heat possible. They hold together the Dragon Claws, effectively making nine tools into one. Finally, we have the Dragonscale Guards to reinforce it all. And that's how it's done! —Reggie, Peerless Artisan
118441020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, gain an empty play point orb.
118441020.evoFlair_: I chased away some nasty dragons so the mines could open, ripped a gang of thieves a new one, and dug a well to get water to this parched land. But I'm good at more than just throwin' down. I'm gonna use this here tool to forge a bright future for us all!

120441030.baseEffect_:
Can only attack if Overflow is active for you.
At the end of your turn, if you have 10 play point orbs, lose 2 play point orbs, banish 3 random enemy followers, and restore 4 defense to your leader.
120441030.baseFlair_: A heaven-sent being of pure flame. Unlike other birds, it does not peck at or do others harm. Its cleansing fire reduces sin to the selfsame ash from which the phoenix rises. Raise your voice in joyous praise, for its coming heralds evil's end.
120441030.evoFlair_:
That phoenix is a distant relative of mine—still pretty young, judging by the scarlet of that plumage. Now if you want resplendence, look no further. Don't I just exude radiant authority?
—Resplendent Phoenix

121441030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Curse of the Black Dragon into your hand.
Enhance (5): Summon a Dragonslayer Spear.
121441030.baseFlair_: Dragon-cursed, he walks alone. With spear in hand, he searches the wasteland for a tiny grain of hope. He breathes dark fire, forging his sins into strength. Now the dragon roars, flying into battle; his spear pierces the dark sky, letting a ray of light shine through.
121441030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121441030.evoFlair_: I spent so long running from my sins and this curse; but the moment I realized my own weakness was my curse, I was able to triumph over the dragon. Never again will I lose sight of what I want to protect; with my friends at my side, I'll overcome any obstacle!

124441010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader. Put a Tidal Tyranny into your hand.
124441010.baseFlair_: Ametsuchi is paradise! My paradise. A land of never-ending spring, where the banquets are bountiful and wine flows freely. Ah... Hospitality befitting of a dragon!
124441010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain an empty play point orb.
124441010.evoFlair_: Yes, I was right to abandon that wretched world! Just the thought of those empty depths puts a sour taste in my mouth... But my currents are coiled tight around Ametsuchi—and any who dare disturb its peace shall know my wrath.

Before the gods were born, dragons roamed this world.

Some mothers beget life, while She lays claim to it. Whether protected or culled, the Great Mother must be dealt with.
