Countdown (1)
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
900423020.baseFlair_: Time shall sate the dragon's appetite someday. With unshakable gratitude, it grants you a step toward the future—in fact, you'll get a flying start.

102432030.baseEffect_: Whenever you discard cards from your hand, draw X cards. X equals the number of cards discarded.
102432030.baseFlair_: If you seek power, then worship the dragon.

100411030.baseFlair_: Deep inside a morass of corrosive venom, an undead dragon prowls. It lost its heart long ago, its claws and fangs are blunt, and the putrid stench of rot clings to its scales.
100411030.evoFlair_: The undead dragon's toxic breath brings death in its wake, while the fire that blazes within its entrails reanimates corpses with an unnatural life.

101411050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
101411050.baseFlair_: For the dragon it was but a show of strength, an attempt at intimidation. But for the humans it was an apocalypse on a nearly incomprehensible scale.
101411050.evoFlair_: The dragon's wrath carved through the land, warping iron as though it were clay. Humans have no choice but to flee in fear when encountering such a force.

105411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Recover 1 evolution point if Overflow is active for you.
105411020.baseFlair_: This sovereign of the sea can live for ten millennia. Its whiskers command the greatest price of any treasure.
105411020.evoFlair_: This sovereign of the sea can swim for ten millennia. Tradition suggests that any who ingest its pulverized shell will live eternally.

107411020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Summon a Basilisk.
107411020.baseFlair_: Nothing gets past us. Turn 'em to stone, buddy! I'll finish 'em off!
107411020.evoFlair_: We've got it under control, so just leave this battle to us! Another easy victory!

110411020.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Whenever an enemy follower attacks your leader, deal 2 damage to that follower, then remove this effect.
110411020.baseFlair_: Deep within the thickest clouds at the pinnacle of the vaulted sky, my companion and I make our home. From that vantage, untouchable by mortal hands, we take aim... and never miss our target.
110411020.evoFlair_: Some call it cowardice that we pick off our enemies from on high. But ours is no easy life. And, in truth, none remain in these skies who could harm us, even if their arms could reach.

111411010.baseFlair_: A lizard that feeds exclusively on rocks. The more it devours, the harder its hide becomes, until no blade on earth can pierce it.
111411010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: If Overflow is active for you, gain +3/+0.
111411010.evoFlair_: The rock-fed lizard's hardened fangs can bite through bedrock, granting it access to a wealth of nutritious minerals beneath. The more it devours, the more powerful it grows, and the greater the scope of its consumption. No force can impede its bottomless appetite.

112411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Megalorca and an Assembly Droid.
112411020.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was an aquatic explorer. To cope with the dangers of the sea, she encased herself in metal. Called by ever darker depths, she still undoubtedly continues her descent into the blue. —Dragonewt Scholar's Record, Part 1
112411020.evoFlair_: There once was a woman who explored the darkest depths of the sea by using metal implements. If those devices allowed her to survive such a deep place, surely they would have other usages too. —Voice Recording of an Environmental Researcher, Part 1

116411010.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded from your hand, restore 3 defense to your leader.
----------
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
116411010.baseFlair_:
"Grind the medicine, add a bit of magic with dragon flame, and voila!"
"Don't you think the color's kinda off?"
"Well, all good medicine is bitter—sometimes even to the eyes! Hehe." —Dragoon Medic and a Warrior
116411010.evoFlair_:
"See? That wasn't so bad. You should start to feel the effects soon."
"Yuck... The pain's gone, but have mercy—that was bitter!"
"Well, all good medicine is bitter! Hehe."
—Dragoon Medic and a Warrior

119411010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain Last Words - Summon a Hypersonic Dragonewt.
119411010.baseFlair_: With one slash, it was all over. The girl moved like lightning, her enemies falling like dominoes. "Hypersonic Fang School Secret Technique: Hypersonic Slicer!"
119411010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119411010.evoFlair_: One slash and it was all over. Her opponent's attack passed right through her, touching nothing but air. "That was just my afterimage. Secret Technique: Hyper Whirlwind Kick!"

119411020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If you discarded any cards from your hand this turn, evolve this follower.
119411020.baseFlair_:
This beast is nothing like the basilisks of the desert. Its temperament is so much more aggressive; avoiding its paralyzing gaze becomes that much harder.
—Master Basilisk Hunter
119411020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)

121411030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, destroy all damaged enemy followers.
121411030.baseFlair_:
Hrm... Fascinating. It seems this is a rare subspecies of lizard. As much as I'd like to investigate further, leaving it be seems a prudent course of action.
—Biologist
121411030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121411030.evoFlair_:
The subject is possessed of an aggressive and spiteful temperament. I was fooled by its lizard-like appearance. As you can see, a bite from its sharp teeth freezes... its victim... so...
—Frozen Biologist

123411030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, evolve this follower.
123411030.baseFlair_: The fishermen who trawl these waters know to head back to shore the moment they see the ethereal shadow in the deep blue. To twist an old adage around, if you can see it, it can see you.
123411030.evoFlair_: The seadevil is well-fed, well-armed, and well-feared. Even on the darkest nights, it latches onto prey with devastating accuracy, drowning it in the depths. All speak of it with dread, for its hunger is as fathomless as the sea.

125411010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Bane.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, summon a Lethal Dragoon Scyther.
125411010.baseFlair_: Say goodbye to your hea—whoa! That ended a lot quicker than I thought it would! Is it just me, or are our battles way too easy these days? Whatever! Gotta move on to the next prey!
125411010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125411010.evoFlair_: I hope you aren't too attached to your head! Not to brag or anything, but my scythe can cleave through a dragon's neck, so a scrawny thing like you doesn't stand a chance!

126411010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Summon a Lizardback Cavalier.
Enhance (8): Summon 2 instead.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
126411010.baseFlair_: Haha, a dragon's just an overgrown lizard! This sweetheart's a lizard too, see? She's got a long tongue that whips out like a lash, and she runs like the wind! I bet before they sprouted wings, dragons were landlocked lizards just like her, and knights like me rode 'em!
126411010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126411010.evoFlair_: Truth is, I wanted to be a dragon knight, but I'm kinda 'fraid of heights. I used to stare up at the sky every day... One day, this gal came up to me, and then it hit me: she looks an awful lot like a dragon. They must be related, right? Right?!

127411020.baseFlair_: A lone mermaid who disappeared into the darkness. Choosing to cut off ties with her kin, she sank deep into the depths of loneliness, one hand stretched out towards the abyss.
127411020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
127411020.evoFlair_:
The abyss calls out to you, and from its eternal darkness, I strike! A watery grave awaits you!
...Yes, yes, that's it! I'm definitely going with that line. So edgy!

100421010.baseFlair_: The sound of a dragon warrior drawing breath is enough to send humans scattering in terror, for they know that this is no ordinary respiration.
100421010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
100421010.evoFlair_: The dragon warrior exhales, and its breath emerges as a stream of blue flames. The conflagration ignites the pitiable humans from behind, turning them to ash.

101421020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Ward if Overflow is active for you.
101421020.baseFlair_: The time is nigh. I am the gatekeeper of death and the oracle of annihilation. Your only choices are to accept your fate or struggle in vain against it.
101421020.evoFlair_: Not even the gods of this world can resist my scythe. Death is ultimately faced by all. The time is nigh. Prepare to become the ash doomed to float forever around the underworld.

101421040.baseEffect_: Can only attack if Overflow is active for you.
101421040.baseFlair_: The mighty sea dragon sleeps quietly for now. But when its great eyes slide open, the entire ocean will contort into a swirl of hellish chaos.
101421040.evoFlair_: The mighty sea dragon sleeps quietly for now. But when its great eyes slide open, a giant whirlpool will swallow first the continents and then the world.

102421020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy a damaged enemy follower.
102421020.baseFlair_: A certain poem describes him as a mighty warrior who could take on legions. Armed with the Nibelung holy sword Balmung, he faced a great dragon.
102421020.evoFlair_: A certain poem calls him a dragon slayer. After a desperate struggle, he vanquished the great serpent, and was soon famous for his exploits.

102421040.baseEffect_: Whenever you discard cards from your hand, deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the number of cards discarded.
102421040.baseFlair_: A vicious dragon that resides in sand-choked ruins. No flames or rays of light spew forth from the creature's maw. Instead, the beast attacks with only an ominous roar.
102421040.evoFlair_: The dragon relentlessly advanced across the countryside, obliterating with a cruel roar the settlements it passed.

103421030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand. Do this 2 times.
Last Words: Draw 3 cards.
103421030.baseFlair_: Don't tell me you ain't never heard of orichalcum! Aye, it's a legendary ore! But it ain't no normal haul. There's magic powers in that bloody rock! —Prospector
103421030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103421030.evoFlair_: Turns out all the legendary orichalcum we heard about was actually the scales of the dragon slumbering in the mountain deep. No way we can bring it back, what with the claws and all! So much for gettin' rich! —Prospector

107421020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If only 1 other allied follower is in play, gain Drain.
107421020.baseFlair_: The fierce warden of the tower glimmers in shades of vermillion—scales likely fresh with blood, or perhaps simply in the shade of a maiden in love.
107421020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107421020.evoFlair_: The ancient warden roars its mighty flames from its lofty tower—serving as a fatal warning to any would-be trespassers, or perhaps simply the sighs of a maiden in love.

110421010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +0/+3 if Overflow is active for you.
110421010.baseFlair_: A single house is about all I can protect on my own. But with my griffin, I can defend the entire kingdom!
110421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
110421010.evoFlair_: One or two people are about all I could keep safe on my own. That's why I fight with my partner here—so I can keep all the citizens safe!

113421010.baseFlair_: Um, did you see a boy with glasses around here? His name's Zell, and he looks like a bit of a know-it-all. Huh, you just saw him on the ground? Th-thanks! I'd better hurry up after him!
113421010.evoFlair_: Zell's a little stubborn and stiff and the opposite of polite... But he's a trusty partner who knows the wind better than anyone! Don't tell Zell I said this though—I'd be so self-conscious if he found out.

116421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. Give +2/+0 to another allied Machina follower.
116421010.baseFlair_:
Conducted an experiment on the captured dragon, improved its body with technology. Can be used to control other dragons. Should make for the ultimate specimen. Revolutionary stuff, really.
—Engineer's Notes, Part 2
116421010.evoFlair_:
Dragons are immutable and governed by instinct. But the dragons of old were experts in changing their form. To control them, we will need greater flames. The dragonfolk shall see the steel of their intention tempered yet.
—Tyranny Reins, Part 2

120421010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 5 defense, evolve it.
120421010.baseFlair_: I'm the one holding up our troops, so it's only appropriate that I carry around a big pillar! But this is no ordinary pillar—it's a manifestation of my spirit! The flames on this bad boy can burn the hide off the toughest dragon. Can you hold a candle to that, whelp?
120421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120421010.evoFlair_: You've got guts, coming at me head-on like that! But that arrogance will be your downfall! I'll smash you so hard you'll be needing a pillar of your own to stand! Now, bring it! Show me the strength that supports your resolve!

125421020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, summon an Ironscale Serpent Drake.
125421020.baseFlair_:
This long-lived serpent is said to be a distant relative of the Ouroboros. Highly adaptable to its environment, it's not unusual to see rapid evolution influenced by its food.
—Applied Dragon Knowledge, Serpent Dragons
125421020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125421020.evoFlair_:
It's theorized that some dragons evolved wings to escape their stronger cousins. The ever-evolving serpent drake is arguably the strongest species: a cause for concern when their territories overlap with those of other dragons.
—Applied Dragon Knowledge, Serpent Dragons

101431070.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
101431070.baseFlair_: An enchanting yet poisonous princess emerges from the mists, accompanied by her dragon. The beast exhales a poisonous miasma that hides both the beast and its mistress.
101431070.evoFlair_: The dragon's cloud of noxious fumes is a sanctuary for the dragon and its mistress. Those who venture into it soon find their skin burnt to a crisp and their bones turned to dust.

104431030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0 for each of your remaining play points.
104431030.baseFlair_: A defender that dwells in the clear sea. It allies itself only with the pure of heart and crushes the souls of the impure.
104431030.evoFlair_: A guardian that dwells in the ever-changing waters. Its power grows as great as its commander wishes, and it wields its power with abandon.

109431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Blazing Breath into your hand.
109431020.baseFlair_: Master always said that dragons and magic were of the same... What did he mean by those words? I decided to see for myself firsthand.
109431020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Lightning Blast into your hand.
109431020.evoFlair_: Master always said magic and dragons were of the same kin... Now I finally understand. The depths of their powers are as infinite as the abysses of magic.

110431010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, gain +2/+0.
110431010.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. Status and wisdom—pointless. Pretty faces, solid bodies—perfectly useless. You would do well to serve we who understand this.
110431010.evoFlair_:
The Third Rule: Control Impotence
Only you that have looked upon impotence may deign to control the powerless. Guide them. Rule them.
—Teachings of the Disdainful Corps

110431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, Choose - Put a Dragoon's Command or Dragoon's Meditation into your hand.
110431020.baseFlair_: The dragoon hails from beyond the drifting clouds. His heart is as clear as the spreading sky, and his voice unfurls like mighty wings, broad enough to shelter the heavens.
110431020.evoFlair_: Weaving his way between the clouds, he descends. His lance rends the soil so his prayers may permeate the earth.

113431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Transform this follower into an Ian & Adelle, Newlyweds or summon an enemy Adelle, Jealous Dragon.
113431020.baseFlair_: The celebrated dragon slayer was ordered to strike down another wicked beast. To him this was just a job, but to his wife it was just plain infidelity: "A-Adelle? What are you doing here?"
113431020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
113431020.evoFlair_: The dragon slayer's saga devolved into a senseless argument between husband and wife. The scorned love turned to jealousy a thousandfold. The swordsman faces off against his wife's rage: "I-I am not cheating on you! Adelle?"

115431030.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0 and give this follower -1/-1. (This effect activates even when attacked or damaged for 0. This follower is destroyed when its defense drops below 1.)
115431030.baseFlair_:
Our attacks hit its armored body like so many droplets of water. But even stone will wear away if you continue dripping water in one spot. Slow and steady kills the dragon... Let's show it just how stubborn people can be!
—Young anti-dragon battalion officer
115431030.evoFlair_:
The dragon's body becomes increasingly robust with every passing day. Upon hearing that report, the soldiers all fell to their knees. In the end, we people were not even as effective as raindrops.
—Veteran anti-dragon battalion officer

119431010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Gain +1/+0.
Last Words: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
119431010.baseFlair_: You! Prepare to meet your makeeerr—Ah! Ungh! What's this rope doing here? I won't let your petty traps get to— Huh?! Argh! I-I'm getting all tangled in the ropes! Ungh, I wish I were dead!
119431010.evoFlair_: My father became a follower of Zeyen and brought war to our country. He also took my sister with him. I can't let his misdeeds continue. That's why I have to be the one to stop him, no matter what the cost...

125431010.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
At the end of your turn, if Overflow is active for you, evolve this follower and deal 6 damage to all other followers.
125431010.baseFlair_: The serpent opens its eyes. The sea churns, the sky blackens. Calm waters devolve into hellish chaos wherever it swims. It writhes in a frenzied dance, the very embodiment of the sea's rage.
125431010.evoEffect_:
(Can attack.)
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to all other followers.
125431010.evoFlair_: The serpent opens its eyes. Continents sink, life drowns. As the sea dragon passes by, shorelines are swallowed into the depths. Its roars reverberate across the earth, the very embodiment of the sea's rage.

900431020.baseFlair_:
"Roooar..." (Sorry for ever getting the wrong idea!)
"It's fine, Adelle. We're in love now after all."
"Grr! Groar!" (Stop, Ian! You're embarrassing me!)
—Ian and Adelle
900431020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Drain.
Evolve: Return all other allied followers to your hand.
900431020.evoFlair_:
"Hey, little baby girl. I'm ready for some time alone with you."
"Grroarr!" (Leave it to me. I'll knock this out.)
"D-don't get too carried away! Adelle?"
—Ian and Adelle

900431030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to all allies.
900431030.baseFlair_:
"Grooar! Rrr!" (How could you betray my love, Ian!)
"Grrrrrah!" (Sneaking into another dragon's lair—you're cheating on me!)
900431030.evoFlair_:
"Groooar!" (I'm not listening to your excuses.)
"Roooar" (All the love I felt for you is turning to rage!)

111441010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: Whenever you play a card that originally costs at least 7 play points, if it's the fourth time or later this match, invoke this card.

Storm.
Fanfare: If Overflow is not active for you, remove all effects on this follower except changes to its attack or defense.
111441010.baseFlair_: A mighty gust erupts, rending clouds of white in two. Heard beyond the wind, transcending both sound and light, "None can keep pace with my wings."
111441010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111441010.evoFlair_: With the force of a single flap, the earth below is fractured asunder. Heard beyond a flash of light and a thunderous clap, "None can escape the rending of my wings."

111441030.baseFlair_:
It dwells upon the land. It has fangs like a tiger's, a forked tongue. It brings the rains and the drought; the heavens' mercy and their wrath. Bow your heads in respect before the oldest of the gods.
—Chapter 2, Prosperity of the Water God
111441030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied follower attacks, if you have at least 3 play points, use 3 play points and deal 1 damage to all enemies. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
111441030.evoFlair_:
It bequeaths blessing and blight without discrimination. Both fall to earth amidst the sonorous rumblings of the skies.
—Chapter 3, Prosperity of the Water God

114441020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Shadow's Corrosion into your hand.
114441020.baseFlair_:
"Viridia Magna will destroy Naterra. We must end her."
Forever stalking, forever analyzing...
"We are Mánagarmr. We seek to destroy the Vile Mother."
The Forest Shadow seeks to deliver the cursed world despite its cowardly king.
114441020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Subtract 2 from the cost of all Shadow's Corrosions in your hand.
114441020.evoFlair_:
"Of course Sköll thinks our methods barbaric."
Unyielding eyes peer into the blinding light.
"Perhaps we should give up. But it's too late to turn back now, you see."
The Forest Shadow grins, his decision made.

714441010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Shadow's Corrosion into your hand.

"Viridia Magna will destroy Naterra. We must end her."
Forever stalking, forever analyzing...
"We are Mánagarmr. We seek to destroy the Vile Mother."

"Of course Sköll thinks our methods barbaric."

118441030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Play point orbs can't be lost. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader. If you have 10 play point orbs, deal 4 damage instead.
118441030.baseFlair_: There once was a noxious dragon who terrorized the land. To appease its bloodlust, the people offered sacrifices. Amid this grievous situation came a red-caped holy knight. He swore that the people would lose not a single treasure more to the dragon.
118441030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.
118441030.evoFlair_: The knight effortlessly repelled the pernicious dragon's arsenal of attacks. With spear in hand, the knight chastised all in his path and struck down the dragon. The people were overjoyed and sang songs of praise to the great dragonslayer, Georgius.

119441010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Whenever this follower takes damage equal to or greater than its defense, survive on 1 defense.
Skybound Art (10): Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Super Skybound Art (15): Gain the ability to attack 3 times per turn.
119441010.baseFlair_: Hey! Do you like your dragon boiled or grilled? What am I talking about? I just caught a dragon, that's what. You're having some, right? Oh, there's also cake! Siero gave me some!
119441010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119441010.evoFlair_: I don't want you to end up as someone's food. But only the powerful can protect the things that are important to them. I'm gonna become the strongest, so I can protect you and everybody else!

119441030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Give an allied follower the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Can't be attacked.

119441030.baseFlair_: A primal beast pactbound to Port Breeze. Her gentle breath rocks the cradles of babes; her maternal winds embrace the people like a warm shawl. The goddess smiles down upon the archipelago, blessing one and all with her love.
119441030.evoFlair_: The goddess prays for eternal tranquility. She is reverent of the heart and believes firmly in love. Yet when those she holds dear are threatened, her three-headed companion bares its fangs and her breezes become violent storms to scatter her foes to the ends of the sky.

121441020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Strike: Give +0/+2, Rush, and Bane to a random Dragoncraft follower in your hand.
When this follower leaves play, summon an Aftershock. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
121441020.baseFlair_: I was born bearing the might of the dragon and the power of lightning. Fate dealt me this hand—I didn't get to choose any of it. But there is one thing I've decided for myself: I'll do my best with what I've been given and bring my people glory.
121441020.evoFlair_: She always turned her words to action. Blessed with the fulminous dragon's power, she fulfilled her vow—she joined the army, made a name for herself, and became the lightning that saved us all. Only one such as she is deserving of the accolade "Lightning Striker."

122441030.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, recover 2 play points.
122441030.baseFlair_:
Gyahaha! Struggle all you want—just makes me wanna hunt you down more!
—Zuo Onizuka
122441030.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Evolve: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
122441030.evoFlair_:
I'm the hunter, and you're the prey. You can't fight against the food chain!
Sic 'em! Brutal Dragonewt!
—Zuo Onizuka

100414030.baseEffect_: Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
100414030.baseFlair_: A searing ray of fire burns all near and far.

101414030.baseEffect_:
Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
Give +3/+3 instead if Overflow is active for you.
101414030.baseFlair_: Oh, you really asked for it now! You just made my baby angry!

102414030.baseEffect_: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and then draw 3 cards.
102414030.baseFlair_: Dragons have no use for the worthless.

112414010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
If Overflow is active for you, put a random Dragoncraft follower from your deck into your hand.
112414010.baseFlair_: Elder dragons use human language to voice their discontent with mankind. Lower dragons use violence to express their discontent with mankind.

709414010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
If Overflow is active for you, put a random Dragoncraft follower from your deck into your hand.
709414010.baseFlair_:
One hundred push-ups! One hundred sit-ups!
And one hundred squats! Then a ten kilometer run.
Do it every single day!

124414010.baseEffect_:
Discard a Dragoncraft follower from your hand.
Draw a card.
Deal 4 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
124414010.baseFlair_: A tiny, rapidly growing shadow was the only forewarning of the dragon, soon to consume the city.

127414010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Draw a card.
If Overflow is active for you, deal 4 damage and draw 2 cards instead.
127414010.baseFlair_: With one swift strike, imbued with all my mustered might, I felled the dragon.

900414010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Draw a card if Overflow is active for you.
900414010.baseFlair_: The man sharpened his sword to slay dragons. The dragon rended the man with its inborn blades.

101424020.baseEffect_: Transform a follower into a Dragon.
101424020.baseFlair_: Accept the dragon's soul into thy body, and thou shalt know power both great and atrocious. Now turn!

117424010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+1 and Rush to a Dragoncraft follower in your hand.
Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
(Can be played only when a targetable card is in your hand.)
117424010.baseFlair_: A solitary whelp tends to be careless, so you could make a quick rupie hunting them. But they get craftier as the years go by, so be prepared for a fight.

900424030.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
900424030.baseFlair_: A putrid breath for the corrupted.

104434010.baseEffect_: Discard your hand. Then deal 5 damage to all followers.
104434010.baseFlair_: The hunter carved out the heart of the sea dragon and held it aloft for all to see. That moment marked both the beginning and the end of everything. —Chapter 2, History of the Desert

107434010.baseEffect_:
Destroy all damaged followers.
Deal 1 damage to all undamaged followers.
107434010.baseFlair_: Their roars should never be heard as one—surely an omen of Armageddon.

124434010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy card.
If any allied amulets are in play, restore 2 defense to your leader and recover 2 play points.
Enhance (10): Destroy all enemy cards instead of 1, and restore 4 defense and recover 4 play points instead of 2.
124434010.baseFlair_:
"I can see... I can see! The legends were true!"
"You're right—look at my hair! What's this water made out of?"
"Wait, did you feel that? An earthquake?! Get down!"
—Dragonjet Falls, Part Five

900444020.baseEffect_:
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Naterran Great Trees that have been destroyed during this match. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
If you've played other Shadow's Corrosions this match, destroy a random enemy follower.
900444020.baseFlair_: Ignorance cradles death. Assumption bears negligence. Knowing this, you would still challenge me? Very well. Face my curse.

105412010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, transform this amulet into a Dragon if the opponent has more cards in play than you.
105412010.baseFlair_: Looks like it could spring to life at any moment.

900443010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the start of your turn, give +0/+2, Rush, and Bane to a random Dragoncraft follower in your hand.
900443010.baseFlair_: A flash of light arcs across the sky as a dragon takes off from the field, unharmed. Having fought her last battle, the hero Romelia resigns. She bestows a gift upon her comrades, cheeks pink as she says, "Lightning leaves no trace, but I'd like you to remember me."

100411020.baseEffect_: Strike: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
100411020.baseFlair_: The great need no reasons for their actions. They simply move and eat as they wish.
100411020.evoFlair_: The great need not reflect on their actions. They simply exist as they wish to, which is proof of their strength.

101411070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Overflow is active for you.
101411070.baseFlair_: A dragon glides through the deep, its blade ever ready to skewer evil intruders.
101411070.evoFlair_: The dragon's blade is a weapon wielded against enemies of the ocean. In return for its deeds, the dragon is loved and respected by the mermaids.

102411060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Megalorca if Overflow is active for you.
102411060.baseFlair_: The fierce sea serpent and her kin emerged from the depths of the ocean, cutting through the turbulent waves and swirling currents.
102411060.evoFlair_: The sea serpent sways her vast body, kicking up waves that block the sun. To approach her watery domain means a one-way trip to the depths.

103411030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Blazing Breath into your hand.
103411030.baseFlair_: You really think you can hunt the wyvern just because it seems quiet? Forget it. The creature's hoping you'll let your guard down. The second you go for it, you'll get a face full of fire breath.
103411030.evoFlair_: You really think you can hunt the wyvern just because it seems quiet? Forget it. The creature's hoping you'll let your guard down. The second you go for it, you'll be incinerated into ash.

104411040.baseFlair_: A seahorse that defends dark, icy waters. As it races through the depths, it's more beautiful than even the finest horses on the surface could ever hope to be.
104411040.evoFlair_: It has no forgiveness for those who invade its sanctuary and violate the sanctity of life. Once it begins to shake with rage, there is no time left for regrets or apologies.

108411020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever you play a non-follower card, gain +1/+0.
108411020.baseFlair_: This is my brand of justice. I know it's tainted, but these claws and fangs are a way of life for me.
108411020.evoFlair_: This is my brand of justice. I know it's heretical, but I can't turn a blind eye to this much evil.

113411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
113411020.baseFlair_: Um, did you see a girl on a wyvern? One named Eyfa who rides a little rough? Huh, you mean she flew by just a second ago! Thanks... I've got to hurry up and catch her!
113411020.evoEffect_: Evolve: If Overflow is active for you, give another allied follower Storm.
113411020.evoFlair_: Eyfa's a little careless at times, but she's a trusty partner and pilot. Keep that a secret though—it would be so embarrassing if she found out what I said.

114411040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower and deal 3 damage if it is already damaged. If it has not been damaged, deal 1 damage instead.
114411040.baseFlair_: I'm so sick of hearing how I don't have wings, or that my tail is weird. Shut your face gash! Or maybe you'd like a few new orifices!
114411040.evoFlair_: No one asked for your opinion. I'm me, and I'll do things my own way. Dig the wax outta your ears and listen good. Or I'll drill you a couple new ones and see if you hear any better through those.

115411030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, randomly destroy 1 and gain Bane.
Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
115411030.baseFlair_:
The sight of its vicious poison drifting through the air is truly breathtaking. And the sweet scent is incredibly soothing, don't you think? Oh how I wish I could stay by its side and enjoy this fragrance forever.
—Young assistant visiting Dinosaur Island
115411030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115411030.evoFlair_:
The dilophosaurus possesses a fierce, deadly poison. By consuming toxic plants, its body secretes a combination of antibodies and poison. The poison exudes a relaxing fragrance, serving to lure in the beast's prey.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

900411010.baseFlair_: A beast that boasts claws, fangs, and wings—but not an ounce of compassion.
900411010.evoFlair_: Trampling, crushing, rampaging—dragon is just another word for destruction.

101421050.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to all allies.
101421050.baseFlair_: This is the dragon to which you should turn if you wish to channel the power of lightning. Do not forget, however, that lightning can also strike those who seek to control it.
101421050.evoFlair_: This is the dragon to which you should turn if you wish to channel the power of lightning. Do not forget, however, that lightning does not discriminate between its victims. It strikes gods, demons, and humans alike.

102421010.baseFlair_: Awaken the savagery hidden within you, and sharpen the fangs that sleep there.
102421010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Transform an allied follower into a Dragon if Overflow is active for you.
102421010.evoFlair_: Howl with the ferocity you once suppressed, and feast on all that you crave!

104421020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and gain +2/+2.
104421020.baseFlair_: The past gave way to the future, the future gave way to the past, and the world fell into disorder after countless ages. And when the liquid in the chalice of the gods was poisoned, I was tainted along with it. Now everything hurts, and only your life can provide relief.
104421020.evoFlair_: There is no longer a dragon to protect the chalice of the gods. There is only me, a hideous Pucewyrm. So come to me and offer up your lives. Nothing else can soothe my pain now.

104421040.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all other followers.
Enhance (8): Deal 3 damage instead.
104421040.baseFlair_: The flame dragon is much like a capricious cook. On some days it wants to char its food black; on other days a light searing is enough to satisfy it.
104421040.evoFlair_: If the flame dragon is in a good mood, you might get away with nothing but a minor burn. But if it's in a bad mood, odds are your ashes will be scattered by the wind.

105421010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, gain +1/+0.
105421010.baseFlair_: Blue and clear! Let's soar! Griffy, fly out!
105421010.evoFlair_: Headwinds or crosswinds, we'll still win! Blaze out, Griffy!

106421010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Double this follower's attack after damage is dealt.
106421010.baseFlair_: Yahoo! Me 'n' this big lug, we're unstoppable! We're gonna steal all the treasure the world's got!
106421010.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Double this follower's attack after damage is dealt.
106421010.evoFlair_: Whoa-ho-ho! How's our speed for you? Faster and faster, we're off like the wind!

108421020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a White Breath or Black Breath into your hand.
108421020.baseFlair_: Some say it's white. Some say it's black. But it's only natural that there's some disagreement. That dragon is a mirror of the heart. —Words of a dragon knower
108421020.evoFlair_: Some say it's the light. Others say it's the dark. But it's both, and it's neither. Dragons can't be measured by human standards. —Words of a dragon knower

111421010.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, draw 2 cards.
111421010.baseFlair_:
Once tasted, the pleasure of tormenting the weak would not relinquish its hold; the light of the righteous path could not compare. What remained in the noble beast's place was but the wrack of a dragon.
—Appendix A, Dragons: An Illustrated Guide
111421010.evoFlair_:
It devours not out of need but out of greed. Of the proud creature it once was, no trace remains. It is an abomination. Blasphemy against the natural order.
—Appendix A, Dragons: An Illustrated Guide

116421020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. If it was a Natura card, gain Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
116421020.baseFlair_:
Seeing how fiercely it chews that grass, what a fascinating fellow. From its big dewy eyes, to its flowery back—you ever see anything else like it? Wonder how it tastes though. Y'all got any of 'em for sale?
—Hungry Cook, on His Visit to Dinosaur Island
116421020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116421020.evoFlair_:
As the dinosaurs adapted to machinery, their physiology began to evolve. Some grew scales as hard as iron, while some blossomed with carapace anew. Just as rapids cut through stone, the changes would not be stopped.
—Jurassic Resistance, Part 2

122421020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly activate 2 of the following effects. If Overflow is active for you, randomly activate 3 instead.
-Gain +1/+1 and Ward.
-Restore 3 defense to your leader.
-Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
-Draw a card.
122421020.baseFlair_: Mistworn Scales, Wings of Water, Frosted Claws... Of these three frozen prizes, you may take the Frosted Claws for yourself. Rejoice, Child of Man.
122421020.evoFlair_:
"What if I just let you eat them all for yourself?"
I see... This way I could create the prizes for you once more! Fascinating! Very well... I shall be your claws!

106431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the cost of a Dragoncraft card in your hand.
106431010.baseFlair_: Her song rings clearly throughout the skies. Lured by the tune, a dragon lands beside her and folds its wings closed.
106431010.evoFlair_: As if accompanying her song, the dragon roars and begins to sound its wings. When human and dragon voices merge in symphony, both the heavens and earth tremble.

109431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is not active for you, deal 2 damage to this follower, and gain an empty play point orb. If Overflow is active for you, give your leader the following effect - Subtract 2 from the next source of damage your leader takes.
109431010.baseFlair_: Scathacha was a fake name to cover my real identity—True Dragon Deirdre, but I've grown accustomed to it now. You, too, would do well to refer to me by this preferred nomenclature.
109431010.evoFlair_: Honestly, the business of men is endlessly quaint. Ah, you there. Show me more of your people's ways. My eyes haven't yet had their fill of your customs. Hehe.

112431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Lightning Blast into your hand. If Overflow is active for you, subtract 1 from the cost of that card.
112431020.baseFlair_: Its storm-bearing wings transform into honed blades. With a single wing it rends the heavens; with both wings it shatters the earth as well.
112431020.evoFlair_: A single strike surpasses the power of both dragons and natural disasters alike. Splendid. —Aldos, Imperial Dragoon

115431010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give another allied follower Ambush.
115431010.baseFlair_:
If one were to invade their neighbor, naught but absolute defeat awaits. Balance is tenuous; conflict is inevitable. War blossoms like weeds in a flower bed.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Eighth Scroll
115431010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115431010.evoFlair_:
No one knows who stands to benefit from the increasing ruin. Even so, there is no reason to stop fighting. What lies at the end of this conflict? The fate of the world is yet to be decided.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Ninth Scroll

119431020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put a random Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 2, 4, 6, 8, or 10 play points from your deck into your hand.
119431020.baseFlair_: It started out like any normal storm. But what sounded like distant thunder was actually a vicious roar. As if in answer, countless dragons took flight, disappearing from view somewhere far beyond the clouds. —Tales of Stormy Skies, Chapter 1
119431020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give +2/+2 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck that originally cost 2, 4, 6, 8, or 10 play points.
At the end of your turn, put a random Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 2, 4, 6, 8, or 10 play points from your deck into your hand.
119431020.evoFlair_: Soon the sky was full of every kind of dragon imaginable, from lithe wyverns to steel-scaled drakes. They rained down blow after blow in a seemingly endless barrage of tooth and claw. This was a storm from which no one could take shelter. —Tales of Stormy Skies, Chapter 5

120431010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain an empty play point orb.
Enhance (8): If any other allied cards are in play, destroy 1, gain Storm, and deal 3 damage to all enemies.
120431010.baseFlair_: Slice and dice and everything nice! Ahh, is there anything better? Oh, sorry. Please, don't take this personally. I was only trying to help. I just got... hehe... carried away.
120431010.evoFlair_: Justice takes many forms, depending on the circumstance. So, what better way to even the playing field than by indulging in a massacre? Ah, what a wonderfully cruel world we live in! Cruel times call for cruel justice. That’s all there is to it, really.

127431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader. Do this 1 time. If you played a Condemned card during your previous turn, do this 2 times instead.
127431010.baseFlair_:
Look at them, pompous and proud, sitting in their gilded palaces... They pretend like they're not made of meat like the rest of us—if it bleeds, it can die. It can be our prey. We'll burn their home down and feast.
—Fields of Fasting: Memories of a Convict, Part 5
127431010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader.
127431010.evoFlair_:
What's the meaning of this? Why are we suddenly being hunted? "We must split up... Quickly, run away, Antemaria!" I don't want to be apart from you... Without you I'm... incomplete.
—Fields of Fasting: Memories of a Convict, Part 6

104441010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain an empty play point orb if this card is played on your fifth turn or later.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader if Overflow is active for you.
104441010.baseFlair_: The beautiful priestess of the Waterwyrm danced for her god at the sacred spring. And the Waterwyrm responded to her wishes by creating a lake to soothe the once dry land.
104441010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104441010.evoFlair_: As the priestess dances, so too does the Waterwyrm. And as long as the priestess continues to dance for the world, the Waterwyrm will continue to bestow its blue blessing.

Fanfare: Gain an empty play point orb if this card is played on your fifth turn or later.

Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal 1 damage to all followers.
When this follower takes damage during your turn, if it's not destroyed, evolve it.
110441010.baseFlair_: The world is beneath me—everything turns to ash and dust with a slash of my claw. I guess if you wanted to be more than a dumb beast, you could swear fealty to me... Oh! Why don't we put the world through the same trial!

110441010.evoFlair_: Ugh, how wretched—how stupid—can this tiny, dumb, deplorable world get? You'd better rebel against it! Or maybe you're useless after all... Oh! Why don't we put the world through the same trial!

123441030.baseFlair_: The world stands equal to me—my claws and flames weren't enough to burn it down. I guess you're more than a dumb beast... I'll admit that you're a worthy opponent. Oh! But let's see who comes out on top in the next trial!
123441030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when an allied follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, put a Fangs of Ardent Destruction into your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
123441030.evoFlair_: Her flames are not a trial, but a forging of the soul. The repeated collision of two formidable forces strengthens the spirit's mettle. Disdain searches for a worthy opponent, and in lieu of one, will crush all beneath her.

Storm.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)

One-winged? Halfling? Yeah, and what about it? My brother's way cooler than you and could totally kick your ass! With him by my side, there's nothing that can stop us!

124441030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Reduce damage from effects to 0.

Yes, indeed I am a halfling. But rather than focus on my shortcomings, I made up for them with the power of knowledge. Even if I can't be like my brother, I still want to have his back.

126441010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there are any Draconic Weapons in your hand, randomly discard 1 and gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.

126441010.baseFlair_:
I'm not alone. I got here because everyone helped me get this far. The power of our friendship is what keeps me moving forward. That's what Shadowverse means to me!
—Light Tenryu
126441010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower. Put a Draconic Weapon into your hand.
126441010.evoFlair_:
Now that I've come this far, I know I can soar to the heavens with you! Let's do it! The Lævateinn Blade will strike the skies! Roar, Lævateinn Dragon!
—Light Tenryu

910441010.baseFlair_:
This is one of Lævateinn Dragon's evolved forms! Bare your fierce fangs and claws! Lævateinn Dragon, Attack Form!
—Light Tenryu

Ward.
Evolve: Draw 2 cards.

910441020.baseFlair_:
Lævateinn Dragon still has untapped power! May your scales be your shield! Lævateinn Dragon, Defense Form!

910441030.baseFlair_:
I'll show you Lævateinn Dragon's third form! Rend the earth with your breath... Lævateinn Dragon, Blast Form!
—Light Tenryu

126441020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain an empty play point orb.
Enhance (7): Summon a Windblast Dragon.
126441020.baseFlair_:
"You've got to be joking! Is that dragon... ship-shaped?!"
Legend speaks of a ship hidden in a remote island cove... only said ship was a dragon. It opened its maw and shot fireballs at the intruder.
—Adventures of Captain Dragewood, Vol. 1, Chapter 2
126441020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Summon a Hellflame Dragon. If you have 10 play point orbs, summon a Windblast Dragon instead.
126441020.evoFlair_:
"Hard to starboard! We'll brand the seas with our claws!"
Captain Dragewood forged a bond with the dragon ship, and thus, they set sail. Their journey to conquer the hundred seas had begun.
—Adventures of Captain Dragewood, Vol. 1, Chapter 8

128441020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Banish a card in your hand and put a copy of it into your deck. Put a Coach Joe, Fiery Counselor into your deck. Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. If you banished an Academic card, gain Last Words: Draw 2 cards.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: If the total defense of all allied followers (including this follower) is at least 20, deal 5 damage to all enemies.
128441020.baseFlair_: No more trying to look "cool." Hiding in your shells like hatchlings is way lamer than giving the game your best fight. Win or lose... get out there and show 'em what dragons can do when they're fired up!
128441020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: If this follower has at least 11 defense, deal 7 damage to the enemy leader.
128441020.evoFlair_:
"What, so does that make it "cool" to give up?! No. There's nothing "lame" about losing one game!"
"Just—sniffle—Just leave me alone! Please..."
"Joe. You've got a fire in you. And I'm not giving up on it."
—Dranz Intl. School, Fiery Pep Talk, 0

900441070.baseEffect_:
Ward.

900441070.baseFlair_:
Dazzling gold and silver—two sets of eyes gaze down from the heavens. Drifting along with the current of the world is what makes a dragon a dragon.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Side Story, First Scroll
900441070.evoFlair_:
A lone man arrives at the peak of swirling gold and silver in search of a bond. He is a visitor from Suiheki. What will he do with this chance meeting?
—Legend of the Three Nations, Side Story, Second Scroll

Rush.
Strike: If any allied Garyu, Supreme Dragonkins are in play, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.

900441080.baseFlair_:
The man speaks of captivating people with valor and wisdom, of his utopia. The people laugh at his ridiculous ideas. But the dragons do not.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Side Story, Third Scroll
900441080.evoFlair_:
Though their origins may be different, a bond is formed between them by the swearing of an oath. They wish to face their death together, on the same day, at the same time.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Side Story, Fourth Scroll

900441100.baseFlair_:
The keeper visited a crimson dragon high in its roost. But the furious dragon bared its fangs at him. Nevertheless, the man tried to calm the dragon down.
—Summoner's Revolt, Fourth Telling
900441100.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900441100.evoFlair_:
The crimson dragon's lament broke the man's heart. It had served mankind for centuries, only to be abandoned in isolation. The keeper wondered to himself: is mankind really worth protecting?
—Summoner's Revolt, Fifth Telling

109414010.baseEffect_:
Destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
Subtract 1 from the cost of a Dragoncraft card in your hand.
109414010.baseFlair_: We succeeded in our initial ambush and took the dragon from behind. However, it was immediately clear that our efforts were in vain. —Excursion Leader

103424010.baseEffect_: Gain an empty play point orb, draw 2 cards, and restore 3 defense to your leader.
103424010.baseFlair_: Only then will you realize that the slashing of claws and fire breathing were nothing more than a simple greeting.

124424010.baseEffect_:

Summon another and give it Ward.
Summon another and give it Bane.

124424010.baseFlair_:
It rages, ebbs, and flows. The heart of man is not so different from the heart of the sea.
The goddess's blessing is reserved only for those who carry an azure sea in their heart.

114434010.baseEffect_:

Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
114434010.baseFlair_:
The light and power of a dying star's final, cataclysmic breath are the nourishment which frees the phoenix from its fiery shell. Its victorious birth cry resounds throughout the cosmos.
—Records of Starforged Beings, Chapter 1

103412020.baseEffect_: While this amulet is in play, your leader has the following effect: Allied followers, spells, and effects deal +1 damage.
103412020.baseFlair_: Way too fine for any ordinary person. —A merchant

101432020.baseEffect_:

Whenever a card is added to a player's hand, halve its cost (rounding up).
101432020.baseFlair_: It is a second sun in the sky, a second guiding truth.

900443020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
While this amulet is in play, your leader has the following effect: Allied followers, spells, and effects deal +1 damage.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
900443020.baseFlair_: A spear with a dragon's horn motif. Reacting to its user's magical energy, it also confers prodigious strength and the ability to wield draconic flames. This weapon has seen a certain royal commander through countless trials and triumphs.

900443030.baseEffect_:
Countdown (10)
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by Countdown.)
Whenever an allied follower comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied followers. If this amulet's Countdown is at 5 or less, give them +2/+2 instead.

900443030.baseFlair_:
Effects: medicinal properties, injury healing, eyesight recovery, hair growth, limb regeneration
Ingredients: draconic acid (naturally spouted)
Caution: do not enter bath while mountain is moving.
—Dragonjet Falls Signboard

100411040.baseEffect_: Gain Ward if Overflow is active for you.
100411040.baseFlair_: I am the guardian of the skies. Those who come to despoil them shall not have their way.
100411040.evoFlair_: I am the guardian of the skies. It is my duty to cast potential intruders back down to the world below.

102411050.baseFlair_: A tireless whale with a deserted island on its back. The island, once inhabited by a sea god, is now visited only by the ocean breeze.
102411050.evoFlair_: The whale, now carrying an island without a master, occasionally leaps from the sea, shaking the distant waves with its cries for its fallen friend.

106411020.baseFlair_: On the battlefield I was born. The clang of iron was my lullaby; I was raised amid the scent of death. I know nothing else.
106411020.evoFlair_: Love makes some other people feel alive. But not me. For me only killing will do. I can't say this is any way to live, but all these hands know how to do is destroy.

108411010.baseFlair_: Pfft! You just headbutted a cloud, didn't you? We're never going to be like her at this rate. Hey! No, no, don't look so sad!
108411010.evoFlair_: Forte, my favoritest dark dragoon! The person I wanna be like! Someday we're gonna ride together, so I won't give up. Never!

116411020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, put an Assembly Droid into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 3 Assembly Droids.
116411020.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was discovered during a battle with the dragonfolk. He was wielding a weapon composited for increased maneuverability and power, almost like a dragon fang. Guess we've reached that kind of tech. —Engineer's Notes, Part 1
116411020.evoFlair_:
Through the power of tech, we've made tremendous leaps toward dragonkind. It may only be a matter of time, now, before we make them our subordinates. The dragonfolk shall see the flames of our ambition stoked yet.
—Tyranny Reins, Part 1

120411030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower, then restore X defense to your leader. X equals this follower's defense.
120411030.baseFlair_: Do not disdain knowledge. Though we beasts may have prodigious physical strength, mental dexterity does not solely belong to man. There is power in having more than one tool at hand.
120411030.evoFlair_: Do away with your scorn. Benevolence is not solely the purview of man. Though we beasts be sharp of claw, there is benefit in caring for and giving succor to your fellows.

900411020.baseFlair_: The malicious dragon wakes, and the world is rent asunder. The beast's insatiable hunger makes it view every living creature as prey.
900411020.evoFlair_: The dragon opens its jaws, and a flash of lightning forks through the sky. It is a fateful warning to those who would dare to cross the beast.

101421060.baseFlair_: This guy's all sorts of greedy, let me tell you. I mean, he could eat all of you and still be hungry. In fact, I think he's going to have to gobble down the very land you stand on.
101421060.evoFlair_: How was that, boy? Tasty? Heh-heh, that's okay. I know you enjoyed it. What, you're still hungry? Well, I guess you've got to keep eating then. Eat until there's no one left!

101421100.baseFlair_: A dragon who manipulates mists from its forest dwelling. While there are those who have seen this creature, no one has ever touched it, and many believe it to be nothing but an illusion caused by the fog.
101421100.evoFlair_: A dragon who hides in the forest, producing dense mists to shroud its woodland home. Rumor has it that these mists are intended to protect its former lover's remains.

103421040.baseFlair_: A wise owl that picked up a sword and headed to the battlefield to protect those it loves. Clad in sacred armor, the owl stands against all threats.
103421040.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower. Then randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand.
103421040.evoFlair_: The owl's eyes look beyond the present into the distant future. Seeking the promised land beyond the trials of war, the owl brandishes its greatsword.

115421010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Leader Strike: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
115421010.baseFlair_:
They seek war and armed subjugation. They boast of their power, their words like a raging blaze. Together, they are a force of mighty warriors. Their name is Shuren, the nation of militarism.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Fourth Scroll
115421010.evoFlair_:
They seek prestige and personal glory. While others fight, they await their opportunity to profit. In doing so, they hone their perseverance. Their name is Konru, the nation of prosperity.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Fifth Scroll

119421010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any enemy followers are in play, lose 1 play point orb and evolve this follower.
Clash: Give -2/-0 to the enemy follower.
119421010.baseFlair_: Oh, hello! My name's Ladiva and I'm a duelist! What am I good at? Well, let's see... cooking, sewing, cleaning, and... haha, using these fists of love! So long as I've got love in my heart, I'll fight for you all!
119421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119421010.evoFlair_: People starved of love are moved to do cruel things. Of course, possessing a heart that can forgive and embrace someone is important, but there are times when a loving rebuke is necessary too! Now, I hope you're ready for my Maximum Love Bomb!

121421020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader. Put a random Dragoncraft follower from your deck into your hand.
(Can only Accelerate if this follower has at least 9 defense.)
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader. Put a random Dragoncraft follower from your deck into your hand.
121421020.baseFlair_: I was mad about something, so I ran to the bluffs. There was a rock and I kicked it over the edge. Then this big fish opened its mouth and swallowed the rock. After that, whenever I was angry, I would head to those bluffs. —Mischievous Boy
121421020.evoFlair_: I always get a kick out of surprising visitors to the bluffs. They see what looks like a gargantuan rock rising out of the sea and scream like a flock of spooked seagulls. You know, it's thanks to me that the whale's as big as it is now. —Mischievous Old Man

128421020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +0/+2 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. If this follower has at least 7 defense, evolve it.
128421020.baseFlair_:
Excellent. Athletics shall prove the perfect opportunity to show sweet Grea my valor... HARK! It is I, Gunbein, heir to dragons divine! Rejoice, for I shall deign to grace your team!
—Dranz Exchange Experience
128421020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Gunbein, Lofty Dragonewt.
128421020.evoFlair_:
"I could bear his poor sportsmanship NO LONGER! Fury welled within me, and before I knew it, we were engaged in combat! And... got disqualified."
"Gunbein... I told you not to cause trouble."
—Gunbein & Grea, Exchange Program Afterparty

101431030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 2 from the cost of a card in your hand.
101431030.baseFlair_: Glorious flames decorate the battlefield as armies march forward in the wake of the wyvern cavalier. She constantly pushes ahead, never looking back, her flame a beacon for her allies.
101431030.evoFlair_: Not the sturdiest wall or the most brutal assault can stop her. Her scarlet flames scorch across the battlefield, guiding her allies to victory.

702431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 2 from the cost of a card in your hand.
702431010.baseFlair_:
They say that dusk is followed by dawn,
But the darkest clouds shroud the heavens.
Who caused this? Why has this happened?
I'll show you the answer.
702431010.evoEffect_: (This card will be treated as a Wyvern Cavalier.)
702431010.evoFlair_:
After malice comes the spiral of hatred.
Get ready. The sun will squirm under darkness.
Roar of ruin, bellowing gloom.
Skies of chaos witness the final despair.

104431020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 for each other follower in play.
104431020.baseFlair_: I have no fear of the number of adversaries. The more there are, the more excited I get! None will outpace me!
104431020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104431020.evoFlair_: The only thing that will be left in this sky is my flames! Now show me how furiously you can burn, my phoenix! Blaze a path for me and only me through the heavens!

114431010.baseEffect_:

114431010.baseFlair_:
It looks so beautiful, wrapped in glittering ice. And that strength, unshakable by the bitterest cold, is worthy of admiration. It's enthralling to watch. I could stare at this majestic beast forever...
—Fledgling explorer visiting Dinosaur Island
114431010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114431010.evoFlair_:
The triceratops's hoarfrost lowers its victim's body temperature, encasing the creature in ice. The triceratops reacts badly to scrutiny. Any who stare too long will become a frozen snack for this beast.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

117431020.baseEffect_:
Ward.

117431020.baseFlair_: A calf once fell from the sky. With no way back, it made the sea its home. What was the ring floating above its head? The whale did not know. But then came the day it breached, and its enlightenment surfaced.
117431020.evoFlair_: The great white whale continues its migration in the clouds. Though nurtured by blue waters, the whale has returned to where it belongs. And now, from the highest seas above, it watches over its home away from home.

120431020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +0/+2 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. Then, if this follower has at least 8 defense, draw 2 cards.
120431020.baseFlair_: Just as celestial beings look out for man, so do they look out for dragons. Though this guardian beast wears no halo, it is blessed with radiant wings that unfurl to protect all its kin who dwell below.
120431020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120431020.evoFlair_: A commandment rings forth from the heavens: save the dragon children. A great claw descends from the clouds not to rend, but to appoint a chosen one. The other dragons roar paeans to the empyreal dragon, the favored child of the divine.

101441020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
This follower can't be attacked if Overflow is active for you.
101441020.baseFlair_: Insolent white dragons! Prepare to be taught once and for all that these skies belong to the black dragons and demonkind!
101441020.evoFlair_: How dare you call yourself the ruler of the skies before me! If you want to rule, I'll give you the chance to do so in purgatory!

701441010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
This follower can't be attacked if Overflow is active for you.
701441010.baseFlair_: Insolent white dragons! Prepare to be taught once and for all that these skies belong to the black dragons and demonkind!
701441010.evoFlair_: How dare you call yourself the ruler of the skies before me! If you want to rule, I'll give you the chance to do so in purgatory!

109441030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Subtract 1 from the cost of 2 random Dragoncraft followers in your hand, and give them +1/+0.
109441030.baseFlair_: Try and fight and defend as many times as you will, the ceaseless bloodshed only continues. Do you fall into despair, or choose to retreat? The answer is clear. "I shall end our battle here!"
109441030.evoFlair_: Swing your blade as many times as you will, fate cannot be persuaded. Do you abandon hope, or abandon tomorrow? The answer is clear. "Let us finish this fight, for a world without conflict!"

113441030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain an empty play point orb, and recover 3 play points.
113441030.baseFlair_:
"It's okay, Mister Dragon. I'll help you guys make up."
Because she cares, because she doesn't want him to be alone—she helps bring the hearts of the two together with her gentle touch.
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 5
113441030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: If you have at least 6 play points, use 6 play points and summon a Devoted Dragon.
While any allied Devoted Dragons are in play, reduce damage to this follower to 0.
113441030.evoFlair_:
The two run to the dragon. Their adventure begins here. The two are reunited and both call out at once, "Sorry!"
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 6

714441030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain an empty play point orb, and recover 3 play points.
714441030.baseFlair_:
"It's okay, Mister Dragon. I'll help you guys make up."
Because she cares, because she doesn't want him to be alone—she helps bring the hearts of the two together with her gentle touch.
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 5

Evolve: If you have at least 6 play points, use 6 play points and summon a Devoted Dragon.

714441030.evoFlair_:
The two run to the dragon. Their adventure begins here. The two are reunited and both call out at once, "Sorry!"
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 6

116441020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you discard cards from your hand, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Fanfare: If you have 10 play point orbs, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
116441020.baseFlair_: Among all the creatures of the sea, this wise dragon reigns supreme. It summons storms, manipulates the currents, and calls forth massive tidal bores. Austere in its workings, it is the manifestation of both the bounty and the wrath of the ocean.
116441020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Discard a card from your hand. Draw 2 cards. If a Natura card was discarded, restore 2 defense to your leader.
116441020.evoFlair_:
"There, there! We've got 'im now!"
"Target acquired. Loading inferno missiles."
"Woohoo! Evaporate everything!"
—Rola, Inferno Dragoon and Nova, Trusty Mech

116441030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if there are no allied cards in play (excluding Jerva, Wyrm Transcendents), deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader instead. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
116441030.baseFlair_: Do not reason; do not justify. These are useless fetters. Smash your ideas, and you will surpass your meager origin. Thirst for a new form, and the dragon's claw shall twist your wish into being.
116441030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Deal 2 damage to all other followers.
116441030.evoFlair_: The body burns and the claws burst forth. This is the form of a dragon. I am unopposable, a seething power that will crush all!

120441020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a Drache, Fiery Dragonlord into your deck. Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck. Put a Howling Conflagration into your hand.
----------
Rush.
Strike: Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals this follower's defense. Then, if X is at least 7, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader.
120441020.baseFlair_: Another pointless day, another waste of time. All anyone does here is strut around threatening and killing each other. You want to rule? Be my guest. The sky is so dark you can't see a thing. Who'd want dominion over something so depressing?
120441020.evoFlair_: I just wanted to see everyone smile. So why'd it have to turn out this way? Today's no better than yesterday. Everything sucks. Fate is a lie and I want no part of it. All I really want is to fly freely in a bright blue sky... but that's just a naïve dream.

121441010.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Naterran Great Trees
For each card fused to this follower, randomly gain 1 of the following effects. Each effect can only be gained once.
-Storm.
-Bane, Ward, and +1/+1.
-At the end of your turn, restore 5 defense to your leader and this follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower. Then, if any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
121441010.baseFlair_: "Beware the forest—though it hides them very well, it too has claws." His gaze narrows on his prey, waiting for the right moment. "If you're not careful, you may become the hunted." Cursed claws tear through the darkness, restoring peace to the woods.
121441010.evoFlair_:
"He said he likes the toy I made."
The people gaze up at him, wonder in their eyes.
"He looks kinda scary, but he's really a nice guy."
Even shadowy curses have a place in the forest's future.

123441020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet. Give your leader the following effect: Once on each of your turns, if you already have 10 play point orbs when you play a card, recover 2 play points. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
123441020.baseFlair_: They say the dragon of legend graces all in its presence with prosperity. Coffers and crops alike will flourish. Greedy fool. Did you really believe that? Only those who can withstand the dragon's aura reap its benefits—all the rest scatter like dust on the wind.
123441020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
123441020.evoFlair_: The dragon of prosperity turns no one away. Be they man or devil, the dragon puts them to equanimous trial. Its radiant aura is neither protection nor grace, but a scorching judgment. Those who endure prosper; those who succumb crumble. The dragon cares not which.

124441020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Summon a Soothing Dragonspring.
Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, draw a card.
124441020.baseFlair_: Once upon a time, a lonely inn rested atop a mountain. The innkeeper, in hopes of attracting new visitors, sought the land's guardian dragon for help. As the dragon bore the mountain on its back, enchanted waters began to spout from its peak. —Dragonjet Falls, Prologue
124441020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
124441020.evoFlair_:
Peril. Frailty. Once a meek life, barely holding on.
"I'll be tending to the dragon's cherry blossoms from today!"
Warmth. Love. Now a precious life, filled with purpose.
—Dragonjet Falls, Part Six

125441020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
During your turn, whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect or this follower evolves, activate 1 of the following effects in order (up to 3 effects).
1. Recover 2 play points.
2. Destroy a random enemy follower.
3. Gain the following effects.
-Can't be attacked.
-Reduce damage from effects to 0.
125441020.baseFlair_: The calamity we face threatens heaven and earth, and our territory is also on the brink of destruction. How amusing. Then there is only one thing to do: tear a path through the blackened clouds and claim what is ours!
125441020.evoFlair_: Follow me and these black wings will guide you to victory! Any who dare stand in my way, be they one man or an entire army, will fall under my spear! Land and sky dwellers take heed, for here stands Forte, the Dark Dragoon!

127441030.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever an allied amulet that originally costs at least 5 play points comes into play, change the cost of this card to 3.
----------
Fanfare: Randomly activate 2 of the following effects.
-Summon an Eternal Whale.
-Recover 2 play points.
-Draw 3 cards.
-Restore 4 defense to your leader.
127441030.baseFlair_: The emerald of the azure sea, the sun that glistens off the pearls! Granting her love equally to all denizens of the ocean, she proclaimed with a radiant smile: "Individually, we are just drops of water... But together, we form the ocean!"
127441030.evoFlair_: The emerald of the azure sea, a treasure valued more than even pearls! All who received her warm love poured affection onto her in kind. "Everyone in the ocean is so kind and loving!" If there was ever one thing in this world worth protecting, it was her smile.

900441060.baseEffect_: Gain Bane and Ward while an allied Aiela, Devoted Knight is in play.
900441060.baseFlair_: Wielding swords, overcoming storms, saving others, vanquishing monsters, and training diligently. The dragon finally trusts the girl as his partner. The two have bonded through friendship... Their journey begins here. —The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 7
900441060.evoFlair_:
"We're going off on an adventure!"
"Wow, the wind feels so great... I'm getting so excited!"
"Let's go, Mister Dragon! You and me and everyone together!"
—May, Moriana, and Aiela

104424010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
Enhance (10): Banish all enemy followers and amulets.
104424010.baseFlair_: An honorable demise granted only to those chosen by the dragons.

105424010.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a follower that originally costs at least 5 play points, change the cost of this card to 4.
----------
Destroy an enemy follower.
105424010.baseFlair_: The beat of thy wings powers this lance. Onward, my friend!

101432010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, transform a random allied follower that costs 3 play points or less into a Dragon.
101432010.baseFlair_: This spire was built on a foundation of ancient dragons' bones and scales. It's said those who pray to it will be granted fangs, claws, and wings.

101411080.baseEffect_: Strike: Gain +4/+0 until the end of the turn.
101411080.baseFlair_: That isn't carrion, you know. Don't go near it. Don't touch it. If it wakes up, it'll eat you alive.
101411080.evoFlair_: A dragon that has used the power of darkness to overcome death. Its claws secrete a venom, and it breathes a cloud of noxious smoke that inflames all living flesh.

101411130.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all other followers.
101411130.baseFlair_: The dragon howls, and the sky freezes over. The dragon takes to the land, and the earth freezes over.
101411130.evoFlair_: The chill breath of the ice dragon is capable of freezing human souls, sealing them away for eternity in a frosty prison.

105411030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost Dragoncraft cards in your hand.
105411030.baseFlair_: Contemptible dragons, gazing down on the surface dwellers! When we slice your wings off, you'll have no path left!
105411030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105411030.evoFlair_: Contemptible dragons, scoffing at the surface dwellers! Our leonine attacks will slice off your head and your pride.

109411020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
109411020.baseFlair_: You never know when disaster could strike and vanish.
109411020.evoFlair_: The giant fish cruises the waves of blue like a shooting star, leaving behind midsummer memories and delectable flavor.

115411020.baseEffect_:
